Empiricism Methodology.name: 经验主义方法论 Empiricism Methodology
Empiricism Methodology.description:
一切都归结于数据。统计数据、运行数据并使用归纳推理可以让您确定任何方案中最可能的结果，而任何不适当的事物都会引起你敏锐的注意。

你可以选择一项基于智力的技能并受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pIHjH1x0AVtiX5Tv]{必有蹊翘 That's Odd}专长。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.jftNJjBNxp2cleoi]{迅速检验 Expeditious Inspection}自由动作。

Enchantment.name: 惑控学派 Enchantment
Enchantment.description: 身为惑控师，你使用魔法操纵他人的内心。你能够巧妙的影响他人，或是夺取他人对自身的控制权。你知晓意念优于物质。你的法术书多一个1环惑控系法术(例如 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{惑控术 Charm})。你学到了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KMFRKzNCq7hVNH7H]{魅惑真言 Charming Words} 学派法术。

Enigma.name: 谜团 Enigma
Enigma.description: 你的缪斯是一个谜，驱使你揭秘多元宇宙的隐藏秘密。如果你的缪斯是一个生物，可能是一条龙或者异世界存在，如果是神明，可能是义洛里或者内西斯。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uVXEZblPRuCyPRua]{逸闻知识 Bardic Lore} 专长并且将 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{克敌机先 True Strike} 加入法术库。

Eternal Confidence.name: 永恒自信 Eternal Confidence
Eternal Confidence.description:
身为达到武学巅峰的浪客，你的每次攻击都满溢着自信与豪勇。你在浪客职业DC的熟练等级提升至大师。

当你将进行打击作为终结技或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{适时反击 Opportune Riposte}的一部分时，你可选择将@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.pyo0vmxUFIFX2GNl]{稳妥终结 Confident Finisher}动作的失败效果添加到这次打击上，若你有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qeLpqH2cMSmIrILV]{精确终结 Precise Finisher}专长，也可以这么做。

唯有此次攻击使用的武器或无武装攻击是你可以用在稳妥终结动作上时，你才能如上述方法使用。

Evasion.name: 反射闪避 Evasion
Evasion.description: 你学会了如何快速回避爆炸，龙息以及更危险的东西。你反射豁免的熟练等级提升到大师。当你在反射豁免检定上取得成功时，视为获得大成功。

Evocation.name: 塑能学派 Evocation
Evocation.description: 身为塑能师，你着迷于魔法的原始之力，用其创造和毁灭。你可以呼召元素、力场还有能量摧毁你的敌人，或以其他方式协助你。你知晓最直接的接触才最优雅。你的法术书多一个1环塑能系法术(例如 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{电爪术 Shocking Grasp})。你学到了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hu38hoAUSYeFpkVa]{力场矢 Force Bolt} 学派法术。

Evolution Feat.name: 进化专长 Evolution Feat
Evolution Feat.description: 进化专长是一种特殊类型的召唤师专长，让你可以通过共享的连接定制你的幻灵。你在1级时获得1个进化专长，展现为他与其他同类型幻灵相比与众不同的地方。如果你重训该专长，你用来替换的专长也必须是进化专长。

Exalt.name: 升格 Exalt
Exalt.description: 你的神卫反应将升格邻近的盟友，让他们一并从中获益。

Exemplary Finisher.name: 惩戒终结 Exemplary Finisher
Exemplary Finisher.description:
你以绚烂巧技使用终结技，并在其上附加特殊效果。若你作为炫技一部分的打击命中了敌人，该打击基于你选择的浪客风格获得下列效果之一：

  • 战舞者 Battledancer 使用终结技后你能立即用自由动作进行快步。
  • 喧哗恫吓 Braggart 若该敌人暂时免疫你的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}，则不再暂时免疫。
  • 击剑诈术 Fencer 该敌人在你的下回合开始前陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。
  • 杂技翻腾 Gymnast 若该敌人被@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}，你会在伤害骰上获得武器伤害骰数双倍的环境加值。
  • 风趣之徒 Wit 直到你下一回合开始，该敌人在对抗你的攻击骰上会有-2环境罚值。

Expert Overdrive.name: 超载专家 Expert Overdrive
Expert Overdrive.description: 你提升了你的手艺技能，你可以将设备推入更强力的超载状态。你在手艺上获得专家熟练度，在成功使用超载Overdrive时，你将额外伤害提升1点。

Expert Spellcaster.name: 专家施法者 Expert Spellcaster
Expert Spellcaster.description:
吟游诗人 你在异能法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练等级提升至专家

德鲁伊 你对于原能的控制更加深入，增强你的法术。你的原能攻击以及法术DC的熟练度提升为专家。

魔战士 你对魔法的基础理解得以提升，使你的法术更加难以抵抗。你在奥术法术（arcane spell）攻击骰以及法术DC上的熟练度提升至专家等级。

先知 随着时间的流逝，神力的繁杂对你而言越来越明晰。你的神术攻击骰和神术DC的熟练度提高为专家。

Psychic Self-reflection has brought you greater knowledge of yourself and, with it, psychic power. Your proficiency ranks for occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

术士 你内在的魔力能够更为简单有效地回应你的命令。你在血统所对应的魔法根源的法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练等级提升至专家。

召唤师 在你深化与幻灵的联结之时，你的法术强度也得到了提升。你在幻灵根源上的法术攻击骰和法术DC的熟练等级提升至专家。

女巫 你学会了更好的控制庇护主给你的力量，你的女巫魔法根源法术攻击骰以及法术DC上的熟练度提升至专家。

法师 对奥术长久的实践强化了你的实力。你在奥术法术攻击骰以及法术DC上的熟练度提升至专家。

Expert Strikes.name: 专家技击 Expert Strikes
Expert Strikes.description: 武艺锻炼更胜往昔。你的无武装攻击和简易武器的熟练等级提升为专家。

Explode.name: 爆炸 Explode
Explode.description:
你的大发明是一种由你的工程技术勉强组装起来的造物，总是处于分崩离析的边缘。尽管这形成了潜在的危险，但也意味着你可以巧妙地诱使它超越设计规格，使用特殊的不稳定动作。见不稳定特征的定义以及其是如何影响你的大发明。

尽管发明家在生涯中可以学到许多不稳定动作，但他们都至少知道怎么让大发明 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.naKVqd8POxcnGclz]{爆炸}.

Extreme Curse.name: Extreme Curse
Extreme Curse.description:
You have mastered a perilous balance between the conflicting divine powers of your mystery, gaining the power to change your fate, but straining both body and soul. When you cast a revelation spell while affected by your major curse, your curse intensifies to an extreme effect instead of overwhelming you. All mysteries share the same effects for their extreme curse.

When affected by your extreme curse, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} (or increase your doomed condition by 2 if you were already doomed). Once every 10 minutes, when you fail an attack roll, skill or Perception check, or saving throw, you can reroll it and use the second result.

The reroll has the fortune trait and doesn't require you to spend an action, meaning you can use the reroll even if you can't act. These effects are in addition to all the effects of your major curse, and they can't be removed by any means until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} to reduce your curse to its minor effect.

If you cast a revelation spell while under the effects of this extreme curse, you are overwhelmed by your curse, and you remain doomed 2 even if you Refocus.

Additionally, if you spend at least 3 Focus Points before you again Refocus, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Familiar (Witch).name: 女巫魔宠 Familiar (Witch)
Familiar (Witch).description:
你的庇护主赐予你一个魔宠，这个神秘生物教授你知识与魔法，牠遵循CRB的魔宠规则，但由于牠是你和庇护主之间的连接渠道，这个魔宠比一般施法者的魔宠更加强大，你的魔宠获得1个额外魔宠能力，并在6、12、18级时再获得1个额外魔宠能力。

女巫魔宠是你的法术的源头和存储库，你必须每天和你的魔宠交流以准备你的女巫每日法术。1级时，你的魔宠知道10个戏法、5个1级法术以及庇护主奥义所赠送的1个额外法术，你从符合奥义的魔法根源的法术表中的常见法术或因故可用的法术中选择这些法术。

每次你升级时，庇护主会教给你的魔宠2个符合你的魔法根源的法术表中为常见或因故可用，且你可以施放的法术。专长也可能给你魔宠新的法术。

你的魔宠也可以不透过庇护主自行学习法术，借由耗费1小时吞噬法术卷轴，牠可以学习你的根源法术表上的任何法术，你可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{学习法术 Learn a Spell}探索行动来准备一种法术的特殊书面版本，来当作卷轴喂给魔宠吃。女巫魔宠也可以从另一个女巫的魔宠那里进行“学习法术”行动来学习法术：此时2个魔宠都必须在行动期间全程参与，而学习的法术必须在你的根源法术表中，且你依然必须支付行动的费用，一般是当作给另一只魔宠的庇护主的供品。你不得以另一个女巫的魔宠准备法术。

如果你的魔宠死亡，你的庇护主会在你第二天准备魔法时派出替代的魔宠，这个魔宠可能是已死魔宠的复制品或转世，也可能是完全不相干的新个体，但还是知道已死魔宠所知道的所有法术。魔宠的死亡不影响已经准备的法术。

Fate Patron.name: 命运庇护主 Fate Patron
Fate Patron.description:
透过庇护主的大能，你得以瞥见未来，并借由研究不断编织的时光缂丝来获得启发。

法术表 异能

庇护主技能 神秘

巫术戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.G0T1xv1FoZ23Jxvt]{偏转命运 Nudge Fate}

赠送法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{克敌机先 True Strike}

Fencer.name: 击剑诈术 Fencer
Fencer.description:
你行动慎重，既佯攻又是故意卖破绽，诱敌出手。

你在欺骗上为受训。每当你在遭遇期间成功对1个敌人进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{分神 Create a Diversion}，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{派头 Panache}。

Fervor Patron.name: 热忱庇护主 Fervor Patron
Fervor Patron.description:
你的庇护主乃是远大理想或目的的化身，祂赋予了你号召众生以推进其使命的威能。

法术表 神术

庇护主技能 宗教

巫术戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GeUbPvwdZ4B4l0up]{热血满腔 Stoke the Heart}

赠送法术 Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Command]{命令术 Command}

Field Discovery.name: Field Discovery
Field Discovery.description: You learn a special discovery depending on your field.

Field Discovery (Bomber).name: Field Discovery (Bomber)
Field Discovery (Bomber).description:
You learn a special discovery depending on your field.

When using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} to make bombs during your daily preparations, you can use a batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{reagents} to create any three bombs instead of just two of the same bomb.

Field Discovery (Chirurgeon).name: Field Discovery (Chirurgeon)
Field Discovery (Chirurgeon).description:
You learn a special discovery depending on your field.

When using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} to make elixirs of life during your daily preparations, you can create three elixirs with each batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{reagents} instead of two.

Field Discovery (Mutagenist).name: Field Discovery (Mutagenist)
Field Discovery (Mutagenist).description:
You learn a special discovery depending on your field.

When using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} to make mutagens during your daily preparations, you can use a batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{reagents} to create any three mutagens instead of just two of the same mutagen.

Field Discovery (Toxicologist).name: Field Discovery (Toxicologist)
Field Discovery (Toxicologist).description:
You learn a special discovery depending on your field.

When using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} to make poisons during your daily preparations, you can spend one batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{reagents} to create three poisons in any combination, instead of just two of the same poison.

Fifth Doctrine.name: 第五信条 Fifth Doctrine
Fifth Doctrine.description:
你从第五信条中获得增益:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.n9W8MjjRgPpUTvWf]{隐修牧师 Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.kmimy4VOaoEOgOiQ]{战斗祭司 Warpriest}

Fifth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: 第五信条(隐修牧师) Fifth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
Fifth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description: 你在神力法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升到大师。

Fifth Doctrine (Warpriest).name: 第五信条(战斗祭司) Fifth Doctrine (Warpriest)
Fifth Doctrine (Warpriest).description:
你强韧豁免上的熟练度提升到大师。

当你在强韧豁免上得到成功，你改为获得大成功。

Fighter Expertise.name: 战士专精 Fighter Expertise
Fighter Expertise.description: 你已经熟习了你的技艺，使他们更难以被抵抗。你的战士职业DC熟练等级提升至专家。

Fighter Weapon Mastery.name: 战士武器精通 Fighter Weapon Mastery
Fighter Weapon Mastery.description: 在你偏好的武器上训练、学习以及开发新的战斗技术所花的时间使你使用你所偏好的武器时特别有效率。选择一个武器组，对此武器组中的简易和军用武器以及无武装攻击，你的熟练等级提升至大师，对此武器组中的特种武器你的熟练等级提升至专家。对于所有你拥有大师熟练等级的武器，你在使用它们时都可以使用其重击专精效果（critical specialization effects）。

Final Doctrine.name: 最终信条 Final Doctrine
Final Doctrine.description:
你从最终信条中获得增益:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.DgGefatQ4v6xT6f9]{隐修牧师 Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.N1ugDqZlslxbp3Uy]{战斗祭司 Warpriest}

Final Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: 最终信条(隐修牧师) Final Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
Final Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description: 你在神力法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升到传奇。

Final Doctrine (Warpriest).name: 最终信条(战斗祭司) Final Doctrine (Warpriest)
Final Doctrine (Warpriest).description: 你在神力法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升到大师。

First Doctrine.name: 第一信条 First Doctrine
First Doctrine.description:
你选择一项信条，并获得其第一信条的增益:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.aiwxBj5MjnafCMyn]{隐修牧师 Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.xxkszluN9icAiTO4]{战斗祭司 Warpriest}

First Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: 第一信条(隐修牧师) First Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
First Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description: 你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{领域入门 Domain Initiate}牧师专长。

First Doctrine (Warpriest).name: 第一信条(战斗祭司) First Doctrine (Warpriest)
First Doctrine (Warpriest).description:
在轻甲和中甲上受训，并且在强韧豁免上具有专家熟练度。

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block}通用专长，这是一个可以使用盾牌减少伤害的反应动作。

如果你的神祇的武器是简易武器，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DfLkIIg2reyYW3a8]{简单致命 Deadly Simplicity}牧师专长。

在13级时，如果你获得@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.0mJTp4LdEHBLInoe]{神力护体 Divine Defense}职业能力，你会在轻甲和中甲上达到专家熟练度。

Flame Order.name: 火焰派系 Flame Order
Flame Order.description: 你与火焰有种亲和力，可以利用它们带来拯救或毁灭。你的特技技能上提升到受训熟练度。你同时获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yOloZIGkulrrPYG4]{火眼火肺 Fire Lung}德鲁伊专长。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jks2h5pMsm8pCi8e]{野火 Wildfire}派系法术。放任非自然火灾蔓延或以破坏环境的方式阻止自然火灾是你的派系禁忌（这并不会禁止你使用火焰破坏或者强迫你去灭除人工或自然的火焰）。

Flames.name: Flames
Flames.description:
Fire lives at the center of the world, the center of the sun, and the center of civilization. You might revere this elemental force, siphon power from the Elemental Plane of Fire, or venerate a collection of deities such as Asmodeus, Sarenrae, the Tian goddess of disasters and volcanoes Lady Nanbyo, or the elemental lord of fire Ymeri.

Mystery Benefit

Like fire itself, you flicker and dance, avoiding effects that would quench your vitality. You have expert proficiency in Reflex saves. At 13th level, if you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.TUOeATt52P43r5W0]{Lightning Reflexes} class feature, your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master, and when you roll a success on a Reflex save, you get a critical success instead.

Trained Skill Acrobatics

Granted Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}

Revelation Spells

  • Initial @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura};
  • Advanced @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wi2HcreCfujKiCvW]{Whirling Flames};
  • Greater @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bynT1UKaDqr8dLNM]{Flaming Fusillade}

Related Domains fire, sun

Curse of Engulfing Flames

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.hqeR9faxHj0NDFFP]{Effect: Flames Curse}

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Minor Curse

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

Moderate Curse

Smoke and flickering visions of flame fill your senses more completely, and harmless flickers of obscuring flames also fill your space.

You are concealed from other creatures, though as the other creatures aren't cursed themselves, they can benefit from effects that would allow them to ignore or mitigate the concealed condition, as normal. All other creatures and objects are concealed from you regardless of distance; however, when casting a fire spell, you automatically succeed at the flat check for this concealed condition for targets within 30 feet.

All your senses become imprecise beyond 30 feet, meaning everything past 30 feet that you'd normally be able to see is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you.

Major Curse (11th)

The flames surrounding you are no longer simply visions.

An aura of fire surrounds you in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10], dealing [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage} (basic Reflex save) to all other creatures in the aura at the end of each of your turns. You lose [[/r 1d6]] Hit Points at the end of your turn each round, with no save; if you have a weakness to fire, increase the number of HP you lose by that weakness.

You can suppress your aura until the start of your next turn by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to diminish the flames, causing neither you nor anyone in the aura to take damage. While Refocusing to reduce your curse, you are continually diminishing the flames, so you don't lose HP. The flames subside if you fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, but they resume when you wake up unless you rested for long enough to reset your curse. As usual for oracular curses, you can't mitigate or reduce the lost Hit Points in any way, though you can still heal the lost HP normally after the fact.

Flames Mystery (Multiclass).name: Flames Mystery (Multiclass)
Flames Mystery (Multiclass).description:
Fire lives at the center of the world, the center of the sun, and the center of civilization. You might revere this elemental force, siphon power from the Elemental Plane of Fire, or venerate a collection of deities such as Asmodeus, Sarenrae, the Tian goddess of disasters and volcanoes Lady Nanbyo, or the elemental lord of fire Ymeri.

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Flexible Spell Preparation.name: Flexible Spell Preparation
Flexible Spell Preparation.description:
This class feature alters your spellcasting class feature (such as Arcane Spellcasting for the wizard or Divine Spellcasting for the cleric). If you choose this class archetype, you must select @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CrS0iDwHmjKqvKti]{Flexible Spellcaster Dedication} as your 2nd-level class feat.

先决条件 You must have a class, such as clerics, druids, witches, and wizards, that prepares spells in spell slots using the same number of prepared spells per day.

Flexible Spellcaster Adjustments You learn spells as normal for your class (a wizard uses a spellbook, a witch teaches spells to their familiar, and so on), but change your spellcasting from your class as follows.

  • You can cast fewer spells each day. Your number of spell slots per day don't advance from 2 to 3 spells at even levels.
  • Reduce the number of cantrips you gain from your class by 2. This archetype doesn't change the way you prepare cantrips.
  • During your daily preparations, you prepare a spell collection rather than preparing spells into each spell slot individually. The number of spells in your spell collection each day equals the total number of spell slots you get each day from your class spells. Select these spells from the same source as normal, such as from a spellbook for a wizard.
  • You can cast any of the spells in your collection by using a spell slot of an appropriate level. For instance, if you were level 1 and had @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile} in your spell collection, you could cast feather fall twice that day, magic missile twice, or each spell once.
  • Extra spell slots you gain that have additional restrictions, like the wizard's specialist school spells or the cleric's divine font spells, don't change due to this archetype, nor do such spells count toward the number of spells you place in your spell collection.

RESTRICTED SPELL SLOTS

When applying this archetype to a class that grants additional spell slots with restrictions, such as the specialist wizard's specialist school spells or the cleric's divine bond, you still gain those additional slots, but they work as normal for your class, and they don't add more spells to your spell collection. A healing font grants you additional spell slots to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} spells of the highest level you can cast, but doesn't add 治疗术 Heal to your spell collection. A harming font does the same for the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm} spell. As a specialist wizard, you prepare one spell per level from your specialty school, which also aren't added to your spell collection.

HEIGHTENING SPELLS

Once you gain 2nd-level spells, you can heighten any spell in your spell collection to any level you can cast,similar to a spontaneous spellcaster's signature spells. The only restriction is that you must select at least one 1st-level spell for your collection each time you prepare, ensuring that you can use all your spell slots each day.

ADJUDICATING CLASS FEATS AND FEATURES

Some of your class feats or features might rely on the fact that you prepare spells in spell slots. While some class feats might no longer work or be necessary with the flexible spellcaster archetype, in many cases you can make a simple replacement and continue using the class feat. The following class feats simply require replacing "a spell you have prepared" or "a prepared spell" for "a spell in your collection" or "a spell slot." For example, in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EpBG4CFMNSZQx7vI]{Counterspell}, you'd replace "a spell you have prepared" in the trigger for "a spell in your collection" and "expend a prepared spell" for "expend a spell slot." Similarly, in @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.au0lwQ1nAcNQwcGh]{Arcane Bond}, you'd replace "cast one spell you prepared today and already cast" with "cast one spell in your collection you've already cast today."

The Counterspell and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQkk7qSSRTFc5jNG]{Leyline Conduit} feats in the Core Rulebook need these substitutions, as does @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.l8KQgN8icNrzYIav]{Form Retention} from the Advanced Player's Guide. @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xhiwito5kneP4sjV]{Spell Mastery} provides additional restricted spells, like divine font or specialist spells; you can take it, but it doesn't add to your collection and works like normal prepared spells.

DISALLOWED FEATS

The following feats from the Core Rulebook aren't available for a flexible spellcaster: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZvPgibovxwiN8Wse]{Call of the Wild}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IMPP5pa8AmvCby4W]{Clever Counterspell}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LAHiW98iPJKplFyK]{Infinite Possibilities}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Reprepare Spell}, and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dJ1ZviNMpt4ID7lc]{Spell Combination}. The disallowed feats from the Advanced Player's Guide are as follows: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.011wnYpjIwCEzFtl]{Elemental Summons}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7mGMHb7irGKZ0eQo]{Miraculous Possibility}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.j01dM0ZAC7KzShx0]{Rites Of Convocation}, and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wa9ZGBTlFuwOjPpH]{Rites Of Transfiguration}.

Flurry.name: 连击 Flurry
Flurry.description:
训练让你可以对目标使用毁灭性的连续攻击。

你对于猎杀目标的回合内第二次攻击的多重攻击减值变为-3（使用灵巧武器为-2）而非-5，你同轮的第三次攻击的多重攻击减值变为-6（使用灵巧武器为-4）而非-10。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description:
你能迅速的用拳、脚、肘、膝和其它无武装攻击发动攻击。你获得疾风连击动作。

进行2次无武装@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strikes}。若2次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。每次打击正常应用多次攻击减值。因其拥有绝技特征，每回合你只能使用疾风连击1次。

Focus Spells.name: Focus Spells
Focus Spells.description:
Focus spells are a special type of spell attained directly from a branch of study, from a deity, or from another specific source. You can learn focus spells only through special class features or feats, rather than choosing them from a spell list. Furthermore, you cast focus spells using a special pool of Focus Points-you can't prepare a focus spell in a spell slot or use your spell slots to cast focus spells; similarly, you can't spend your Focus Points to cast spells that aren't focus spells. Even some classes that don't normally grant spellcasting, such as the Champion and Monk, can grant focus spells.

Focus spells are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up, just like cantrips are. You can't cast a focus spell if its minimum level is greater than half your level rounded up, even if you somehow gain access to it.

Casting any of your focus spells costs you 1 Focus Point. You automatically gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point the first time you gain an ability that gives you a focus spell.

You replenish all the Focus Points in your pool during your daily preparations. You can also use the Refocus activity to pray, study, meditate, or otherwise reattune yourself to the source of your focus magic and regain a Focus Point.

Some abilities allow you to increase the Focus Points in your pool beyond 1. Typically, these are feats that give you a new focus spell and increase the number of points in your pool by 1. Your focus pool can't have a capacity beyond 3 Focus Points, even if feats that increase your pool would cause it to exceed this number.

To regain focus points, see the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} action.

Spellcasters with Focus Spells

SourceCore Rulebook pg. 302

If you are a spellcaster, your focus spells are the same tradition of spell as the class that gave you the focus spell. A Bard's are @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.fEOj0eOBe34qYdAa]{Occult}, a Cleric's are @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.AvNbdGSOTWNRgcxs]{Divine}, a Druid's are @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.b8pnRxGuNzG0buuh]{Primal}, a Wizard's are @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.S6WW4Yyg4XonXGHD]{Arcane}, and a Sorcerer's are determined by their bloodline.

Non-Spellcasters with Focus Spells

Source Core Rulebook pg. 302

If you get focus spells from a class or other source that doesn't grant spellcasting ability (for example, if you're a Monk with the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3a07jkWezSuORSpS]{Ki Strike} feat), the ability that gives you focus spells also provides your proficiency rank for spell attack rolls and spell DCs, as well as the magical tradition of your focus spells. You gain the ability to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} and use any spellcasting actions necessary to cast your focus spells (see below). However, you don't qualify for feats and other rules that require you to be a spellcaster.

Forensic Medicine Methodology.name: 法医学方法论 Forensic Medicine Methodology
Forensic Medicine Methodology.description:
你已经了解到在大多数情况下，尤其是谋杀中，罪犯在身体上留下的犯罪证据比他们愿意相信的还要多。从擦伤到骨骼损伤、血液飞溅，甚至是腐烂昆虫的生命周期，这些资讯都可以提供宝贵的线索，协助现场重构。

你在医疗上受训，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ws9JlysHcFoz6WAQ]{法医直觉 Forensic Acumen}和@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{战地医疗 Battle Medicine}技能专长。当你使用战地医疗时，如果成功，目标将额外恢复与你等级相同的生命值，并且目标将暂时免疫此效果的时间为一小时而非一天。

Formula Book.name: Formula Book
Formula Book.description:
An alchemist keeps meticulous formulas for every item they can create. You start with a standard @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qCEOZ6109Yo34tRx]{Formula Book (Blank)} worth 10 sp or less for free. The formula book contains the formulas for two common 1st-level alchemical items of your choice, in addition to those you gained from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} and your research field.

Each time you gain a level, you can add the formulas for two common alchemical items to your formula book. These new formulas can be for any level of item you can create. You learn these formulas automatically, but it's also possible to find or buy additional formulas in settlements or from other alchemists, or to invent them with the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XR95taODq1sq82Du]{Inventor} feat.

Fourth Doctrine.name: 第四信条 Fourth Doctrine
Fourth Doctrine.description:
你从你的第四信条中获得增益:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.vxOf4LXZcqUG3P7a]{隐修牧师 Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.px3gVYp7zlEQIpcl]{战斗祭司 Warpriest}

Fourth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: 第四信条(隐修牧师) Fourth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
Fourth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description:
你在无武装攻击和你的神祇的偏好武器上获得专家熟练度。

当你使用神祇的偏好武器在攻击骰上成功重击时，该武器的重击专精效果生效；如果需要，使用你的神术法术DC。

Fourth Doctrine (Warpriest).name: 第四信条(战斗祭司) Fourth Doctrine (Warpriest)
Fourth Doctrine (Warpriest).description: 你在神力法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升到专家。

Frog Animal Instinct.name: Frog Animal Instinct
Frog Animal Instinct.description:
The fury of a wild predator fills you when you Rage, granting you ferocious unarmed attacks. Cultures that revere vicious animals (such as apes or bears) give rise to barbarians with this instinct. You might also be at war with an uncontrollable, animalistic side of your personality, or you might be a descendant of a werewolf or another werecreature.

  • Frog Instinct
    • Jaws (Unarmed) 1d10 Bludgeoning
    • Tongue (Agile, Unarmed) 1d4 Bludgeoning

Anathema

Flagrantly disrespecting an animal of your chosen kind is anathema to your instinct, as is using weapons while raging.

Bestial Rage (Instinct Ability)

When you Rage, you gain your chosen animal's unarmed attack (or attacks). The specific attack gained, the damage it deals, and its traits are listed on Table 3-3: Animal Instincts. These attacks are in the brawling group. Your Rage action gains the morph, primal, and transmutation traits.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

Increase the damage die size for the unarmed attacks granted by your chosen animal by one step, and increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 5 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks. The frog's tongue attack and deer's antler attack gain reach 10 feet. If you have greater weapon specialization, increase the damage from Rage from 5 to 12 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing and slashing damage.

Fury Instinct.name: 狂怒本能 Fury Instinct
Fury Instinct.description:
你的狂暴来源于内心深处的纯粹性情。你可以随心所欲地驾驭怒意。

禁忌与本能能力 Anathema and Instinct Ability

你没有禁忌和本能能力。作为替代，你获得一项1级野蛮人专长。

专精能力 Specialization Ability7级

狂暴提供的额外伤害由2点提高到6点。若你拥有高等武器专精，狂暴提供的额外伤害提高到12点。

狂暴抗性 Raging Resistance9级

你可抵抗物理武器伤害，但其他来源的物理伤害除外（比如非武装攻击）。

Giant Instinct.name: 巨人本能 Giant Instinct
Giant Instinct.description:
你的狂暴赋予你巨人的蛮力和体型。这不意味着你一定尊敬巨人——你可能会嘲笑他们，甚至渴望杀死他们！由于你的超凡力量或张扬的情感和态度，其他人可能会觉得你就像个巨人。

禁忌 Anathema

你的禁忌是未能直面一项关乎力量的个人挑战。

巨人杀手 [本能能力] Titan Mauler [Instinct Ability]

若你的体型为小型或中型，可以使用为大型生物制造的武器（通常情况和狂暴时都可使用）。若你不是小型或中型，则你可使用为体型比你大一级的生物制造的武器。你获得使用这一种比你大一个体型武器的许可，武器类型必须在角色创建时可选。这把武器具有对应其型号的正常价格和负载（Bulk）。你在战斗中持用这种武器时，狂暴提供的额外伤害由2点提高到6点，但你将因为武器的笨重型号而获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙Clumsy 1}状态。在持用该武器时，你无法以任何方法移除此笨拙状态或忽略其妨害。

专精能力 Specialization Ability7级

狂暴时你用升型武器造成的额外伤害由6点提高到10点；若你拥有高等武器专精，额外伤害由10点提高到18点。

狂暴抗性 Raging Resistance9级

你可抵抗钝击伤害，以及寒冷、电击、或火焰伤害中的一类，由你在获得狂暴抗性时选择。

注意：开启狂暴时，你需要手动添加@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙Clumsy 1}状态。注意更改武器的体型以确保“本能”能力正常适用。

Gold Dragon Instinct.name: Gold Dragon Instinct
Gold Dragon Instinct.description:
You summon the fury of a mighty dragon and manifest incredible abilities. Perhaps your culture reveres draconic majesty, or you gained your connection by drinking or bathing in dragon's blood or after watching a marauding wyrm burn your village.

  • Gold Dragon
    • Type Metallic
    • Breath Weapon Cone of Fire

Anathema

Letting a personal insult against you slide is anathema to your instinct. Choose whether your character respects or abhors your dragon type. If you respect it, defying such a dragon is anathema, and if you abhor it, failing to defeat such a dragon you come across is anathema.

Draconic Rage (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 4 and change its damage type to match that of your dragon's breath weapon instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack. If you do this, your Rage action gains the arcane and evocation traits, as well as the trait matching the damage type.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

When you use draconic rage, you increase the additional damage from Rage from 4 to 8. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage when using draconic rage from 8 to 16.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing damage and the damage type of your dragon's breath weapon.

Graceful Legend.name: 传奇机动 Graceful Legend
Graceful Legend.description: 你高超的移动法让你获得无与伦比的防护与进攻。你的无甲防御熟练等级提升为传奇，武僧职业DC的熟练等级提升为大师。若你已学会真气法术，你在使用真气法术的魔法根源上的法术攻击和法术DC，会提升为大师熟练等级。

Graceful Mastery.name: 大师机动 Graceful Mastery
Graceful Mastery.description: 战斗时的你动若脱兔，闪转腾挪无一不精。你无甲防御的熟练等级提升为大师。

Great Fortitude.name: 强韧加强 Great Fortitude
Great Fortitude.description: 你的身体出奇强壮。你在强韧豁免上的熟练等级提升至专家。

Greater Deed.name: 高等炫技 Greater Deed
Greater Deed.description: 你已经精通了道途的巅峰技术，根据你在1级时选择的道途，你获得该道途的高等炫技能力。

Greater Eidolon Specialization.name: 高等幻灵专精 Greater Eidolon Specialization
Greater Eidolon Specialization.description: 你的幻灵从武器专精中获得的伤害增加到4点，大师是6点，传奇是8点。

Greater Field Discovery.name: Greater Field Discovery
Greater Field Discovery.description: You learn an incredible discovery that advances your understanding of your field.

Greater Field Discovery (Bomber).name: Greater Field Discovery (Bomber)
Greater Field Discovery (Bomber).description:
You learn an incredible discovery that advances your understanding of your field.

You can increase the splash on your bombs to damage creatures within 10 feet, or 15 feet if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gyVcJfZTmBytLsXq]{Expanded Splash}.

Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon).name: Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon)
Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon).description:
You learn an incredible discovery that advances your understanding of your field.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create any type of elixir of life, the creature drinking the elixir gains the maximum Hit Points possible for that elixir, instead of rolling to determine the number of Hit Points regained.

Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist).name: Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist)
Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist).description:
You learn an incredible discovery that advances your understanding of your field.

If you imbibe another mutagen while you are under the effects of a mutagen, you can gain the benefits and the drawbacks of both mutagens at once, despite the fact that they both have the polymorph trait and would not normally function together.

If you come under the effects of any further mutagens while benefiting from two mutagens, you lose the benefit of one of the former mutagens of your choice, while retaining the drawbacks of all the mutagens.

If you are under the effects of two mutagens and you come under the effect of a non-mutagen polymorph effect, you lose the benefits of the mutagens while retaining the drawbacks of both.

Greater Field Discovery (Toxicologist).name: Greater Field Discovery (Toxicologist)
Greater Field Discovery (Toxicologist).description:
You learn an incredible discovery that advances your understanding of your field.

You can apply two different injury poisons to the same weapon, though not to a piece of ammunition. The two poisons can be up to six levels lower than your level, and you can't use the poisons made without spending a batch of infused reagents via @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LlZ5R50z9j8jysZL]{Perpetual Infusions}. Applying the two poisons requires a separate action to apply each poison.

Once completed, you combine the two poisons on the weapon into a double poison with the lower of the two poisons' DCs. This double poison is only virulent if both poisons were virulent, and if the poisons have a different number of stages, the double poison has a number of stages equal to the poison with the lower number of stages. The target takes the effects of both poisons for its current stage.

Greater Juggernaut.name: Greater Juggernaut
Greater Juggernaut.description: You have a stalwart physiology. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to legendary. When you roll a critical failure on a Fortitude save, you get a failure instead. When you roll a failure on a Fortitude save against an effect that deals damage, you halve the damage you take.

Greater Resolve.name: 高等决心 Greater Resolve
Greater Resolve.description:
惊人的训练让你的心智无比坚韧。

你的意志豁免熟练等级提升至传奇。当你意志豁免投出成功时，你会获得大成功作为替代。当你意志豁免投出大失败时，你会获得失败作为替代。当你对抗伤害效果的意志豁免失败时，你只受到一半伤害。

Greater Weapon Specialization.name: 高等武器专精 Greater Weapon Specialization
Greater Weapon Specialization.description: 你使用具有专家熟练度的武器或无武装攻击时，从武器专精中获得的伤害增加到4点，大师是6点，传奇是8点。

Greater Weapon Specialization (Barbarian.name: 高等武器专精(野蛮人) Greater Weapon Specialization (Barbarian)
Greater Weapon Specialization (Barbarian.description:
你已得心应手的武器在你手中变得格外可怕。对于拥有专家熟练度的武器和非武装攻击，你从武器专精获得的额外伤害提高到4点。若你有大师熟练度，额外伤害提升为6点，若有传奇熟练度则提升为8点。

你从所选“本能”的专精能力中获得更大的好处。详情查看“本能”条目。

Green Dragon Instinct.name: Green Dragon Instinct
Green Dragon Instinct.description:
You summon the fury of a mighty dragon and manifest incredible abilities. Perhaps your culture reveres draconic majesty, or you gained your connection by drinking or bathing in dragon's blood or after watching a marauding wyrm burn your village.

  • Green Dragon
    • Type Chromatic
    • Breath Weapon Cone of Poison

Anathema

Letting a personal insult against you slide is anathema to your instinct. Choose whether your character respects or abhors your dragon type. If you respect it, defying such a dragon is anathema, and if you abhor it, failing to defeat such a dragon you come across is anathema.

Draconic Rage (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 4 and change its damage type to match that of your dragon's breath weapon instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack. If you do this, your Rage action gains the arcane and evocation traits, as well as the trait matching the damage type.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

When you use draconic rage, you increase the additional damage from Rage from 4 to 8. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage when using draconic rage from 8 to 16.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing damage and the damage type of your dragon's breath weapon.

Gunslinger Expertise.name: 枪客专家训练 Gunslinger Expertise
Gunslinger Expertise.description: 你精湛的射击更加难以被预测和抵挡。你的枪客职业DC熟练等级提升至专家。

Gunslinger Weapon Mastery.name: 枪客武器精通 Gunslinger Weapon Mastery
Gunslinger Weapon Mastery.description: 你完全了解如何最大化利用你独到的武器。你对简单和军用火器及弩的熟练提升为大师。你对于进阶火器和弩，简单武器，军用武器和无武装攻击的熟练提升为专家。你在使用所有火器和弩时都可以使用其重击专精效果（critical specialization effects）。

Gunslinger's Way.name: Gunslinger's Way
Gunslinger's Way.description:
All gunslingers have a particular way they follow, a combination of philosophy and combat style that defines both how they fight and the weapons they excel with. At 1st level, your way grants you an initial deed, a unique reload action called a slinger's reload, and proficiency with a particular skill. You also gain advanced and greater deeds at later levels, as well as access to way-specific feats.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.a3pSIKkDVTvvNSRO]{Way of the Drifter} You wander across the battlefield, equally at home in and out of the fray.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.qRLRrHf0kzaJ7xt0]{Way of the Pistolero} You carefully maintain your distance at a duelist's 10 paces with pistol in hand.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.QWXvksGJhOjXbBqi]{Way of the Sniper} You practice a methodical style of shooting, striking from far cover.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.vB0yVFxJVZwalt2g]{Way of the Vanguard} You rely on a brutal combat style that uses heavy weapons and explosive attacks.

Gunslinging Legend.name: 枪术传奇 Gunslinging Legend
Gunslinging Legend.description: 你知晓的独到技术使你在使用火器及弩时展现出无与伦比的技术。你对于简单和军用火器和弩的熟练提升为传奇，对于进阶火器和弩的熟练提升为大师。你在简易武器，军用武器以及无武装攻击的熟练提升为专家。

Gymnast.name: 杂技翻腾 Gymnast
Gymnast.description:
你灵活复位，行动快捷，透过身躯呈现的大胆特技足以迷惑对手。

你在运动上为受训。每当你在遭遇期间成功对1个敌人进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grapple}、@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{拌摔 Trip}，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{派头 Panache}。

Heightened Senses.name: Heightened Senses
Heightened Senses.description: Your instinct heightens each of your senses further. Your proficiency rank for Perception increases to master.

Hero's Defiance.name: 英雄不屈 Hero's Defiance
Hero's Defiance.description: 只要神圣之力尚未燃尽，你就能违抗命运继续战斗。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uGXWkR2h8q9MRzEM]{英雄不屈 Hero's Defiance} 虔诚法术。

Hexes.name: 巫术 Hexes
Hexes.description:
你的庇护主借由魔宠赐与了你名叫巫术的特殊法术。巫术是直接汲取庇护主魔力的短暂效果。你每回合只能施放1个巫术，试图施放当回合第2次巫术会导致法术失败并失去用来施法的动作。

巫术是一种聚能法术。施放一个聚能法术需要消耗1点聚能点，并且你在开始时拥有一个1点聚能点的聚能池。你在每日准备时重新填满聚能池，也可通过花费10分钟使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocus}行动与魔宠交流来重获1点聚能点。

聚能法术会自动升阶到你等级的一半，向上取整。聚能法术无需也无法使用法术位施展。某些专长能给与你更多聚能法术，并能提升聚能池的大小，但聚能池最大不会超过3点。

你学会@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rMOI8JFJ0nT2mrCF]{雾化魔宠 Phase Familiar}巫术。你从女巫教诲中学会大多数其他巫术。

巫术戏法

巫术戏法是施放时不消耗聚能点的特殊巫术，因此你可随意施放，但依然必须遵守每轮1个巫术的规则。巫术戏法不计入你获得女巫施法能力时学会的戏法中，也不会占据你的准备戏法位。你依照庇护主奥义获得巫术戏法。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description: 当专精于单个敌人时，你的追猎永无止息。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}动作。

Hunter's Edge.name: 猎手优势 Hunter's Edge
Hunter's Edge.description:
你受到过无数岁月的训练，成为一名专业的猎手和追踪者，你可以获得与专攻方向相关的，对猎杀目标的额外效果。选择一个猎手优势:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{连击 Flurry}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{机智 Outwit}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{精准 Precision}

Hybrid Study.name: 融汇研究 Hybrid Study
Hybrid Study.description:
你大量的物理训练和细心的法术选择一并塑造了一种独特且致命的战斗风格，其效果远大于两者的简单相加。你选择一个融汇研究（hybrid study）领域，其作为你独到的技能结合方式的象征。你的融汇研究给予你一个特殊能力，其通常与 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.KVj5ofUwu3VJSrVw]{法术打击} 或者 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.09iL38CZZEa0q0Mt]{奥术奔涌}, 相关，并且它决定你的初始汇聚法术（conflux spell）。融汇研究在此书接下来的部分中展示。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ZslXrvYRxHBXc1Ds]{无当重刃 Inexorable Iron}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.3gVDqDPSz4fB5T9G]{诡笑锋影 Laughing Shadow}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.maGzhKLmgubAdUlN]{闪耀法盾 Sparkling Targe}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pew7duAozEeAemif]{星火流矢 Starlit Span}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.6YJ8KFl7THkVy6Gm]{盘虬杖形 Twisting Tree}

Illusion.name: 幻术学派 Illusion
Illusion.description: 身为幻术师，你用魔法创造画面、虚像和幻影迷惑你的敌人。你知晓知觉即真实。你的法术书多一个1环幻术系法术(例如 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{虚幻物体 Illusory Object})。你学到了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fXdADBwxmBsU9xPk]{扭曲地形 Warped Terrain} 学派法术。

Improved Evasion.name: Improved Evasion
Improved Evasion.description: Your ability to elude danger is matchless. Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to legendary. When you roll a critical failure on a Reflex save, you get a failure instead. When you roll a failure on a Reflex save against a damaging effect, you take half damage.

Improved Familiar Attunement.name: 改良魔宠谐调 Improved Familiar Attunement
Improved Familiar Attunement.description: 你长久以来针对法师与魔宠之间契约进行魔法上的微调，相较于现在大部分法师通用但安全的契约，你的做法改良了双方间的神秘联系。你与自己的魔宠形塑了这样的联系，从中获得了比其他法师更多的优势。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bcxIg7wi8ZAhvhOD]{魔宠 Familiar} 法师专长作为奖励专长。你的魔宠获得一个额外能力，当你6、12、18级时各获得一个额外能力。你与你魔宠的联系改变你的奥术连结职业能力，所以你把你的魔法能量储存在你的魔宠身上，而不是自己的物品上；你还会获得汲取魔宠(Drain Familiar)自由动作而不会获得汲取连结物品自由动作。汲取魔宠可在任何你可以使用汲取连结物品的时候使用，并且效果相同，除了你是从魔宠身上汲取而不是从物品上汲取。

Improved Flexibility.name: 融会贯通 Improved Flexibility
Improved Flexibility.description: 你丰富的经验使你能更好地适应每一天的挑战。当你使用@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.8g6HzARbhfcgilP8]{千招百式 Combat Flexibility}时，你可以获得两个战士专长而非一个。第二个专长必须为14级或以下且可以使用第一个专长作为先决条件。你必须满足所有其它先决条件。

Incredible Movement.name: 高速移动 Incredible Movement
Incredible Movement.description: 行如疾风势如闪电。当你未穿甲时，你的速度获得10尺状态加值。在3级之后每4级，该加值增加5尺。

Incredible Senses.name: 惊人感官 Incredible Senses
Incredible Senses.description: 你可以注意到常人几乎无法发现的事物。你察觉的熟练等级提升为传奇。

Indomitable Will.name: Indomitable Will
Indomitable Will.description: Your rage makes it difficult to control you. Your proficiency rank for Will saves increases to master. When you roll a success on a Will save, you get a critical success instead.

Inexorable Iron.name: 无当重刃 Inexorable Iron
Inexorable Iron.description:
一旦你始于一条道路，任何事物都不能阻挡你到达其终点。你将巨斧（greataxe）、巨剑（greatsword）或长武（polearm）的质量转化为无可阻挡的力道以强化自身攻击威力或保持自身屹立于战场上。

当你进入奥术奔涌（Arcane Cascade）架式时或者每个你处于奥术奔涌架式的回合开始时，如果你双手（in two hands）握持着（wieding）一把近战武器，你获得数值等同于你等级一半的临时生命值（最少1点临时生命值）。

汇聚法术 Conflux Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r82rqcm0MmGaBFkM]{雷鸣打击 thunderous strike}

Infinite Invention.name: 无限发明 Infinite Invention
Infinite Invention.description:
你调整大发明的能力达到了不可能的高度，你能使用这种技能在你的空闲时间中进行大量的调整。在你的每日准备期间，如果大发明被摧毁或受损，你自动修复你的大发明，你也能够改成另一种大发明（护甲，构装体，武器，或其他你获得许可的类型）并改变你的改修和攻势增压。

如果你有以之前的大发明为先决条件的专长，你无法使用它们，除非按照通常的方式重训。然而，你只需要1天就能将其改为以新的大发明为先决条件的专长，而非1周。

Infused Reagents.name: 灌注试剂 Infused Reagents
Infused Reagents.description:
你将自己独有的炼金精华灌注至试剂之中，让你能够无需代价地创造出炼金物品。每天在你日常准备期间，你获得数批灌输试剂，数量为你的等级+你的智力调整值。你能够将这些试剂用于高阶炼金术或高速炼金（Quick Alchemy），如下所述。同时，这些灌注试剂为轻负载（Light Bulk）。

一旦你进行下一次日常准备，你在上次日常准备中获取的灌注试剂就会立即被摧毁，前一天的灌注物品带来的非永久效果也会立即结束。虽然这些灌注试剂是客观存在的物品，但他们不能被复制，储存，或通过除了日常准备以外的任何其他方式创造。任何这类伪造的试剂都缺乏灌注并且不能被用于高阶炼金术或高速炼金（Quick Alchemy）。

Innovation.name: 大发明 Innovation
Innovation.description:
虽然你总是在发明，但还是有一件发明是代表你的最高杰作，你希望这件发明在经过各种调整后能改变世界。从下列大发明中选择一种。你的大发明等级等于你的等级。如果你的大发明被摧毁，你可以花费1天的休整期，进行一次手艺检定，使用符合你等级的高DC；成功时，你重新建造了它。大发明只有在你对其持续性地维护和修补时才能正常工作，因此不存在市场价格。

你能从本书中选择的大发明如下所述。

护甲 Armor

你的大发明是最尖端的中甲套装，上面安装了数不胜数的小设备和小组件。从护甲大发明数据表中为你的护甲大发明选择一组数据（或选择你获得许可的护甲大发明数据）。

你的护甲大发明可以和普通护甲一样添加基础和性能符文。由于大发明的一些独特性质，除你之外的每个人都对其未受训，即使他们可能正常在中甲上受训（或更高）。选择一种初始护甲改修应用在你的大发明上，从下述选项中选择，或选择你获得许可的其他初始护甲改修选项。

  • 谐波振荡器 Harmonic Oscillator 你的护甲能按照正确的频率安静地震动着，可以干涉力场波和音波。你获得等同于3+你等级一半的力场和音波伤害抗力。当处于超载效果中时，抗力提升2点。
  • 金属电抗 Metallic Reactance 你的护甲使用的金属经过细致的合金化，能够接地，并避免化学腐蚀。你获得等于3+你等级一半的酸液和电击伤害抗力。当处于超载效果中时，抗力提升2点。
  • 肌肉外骨骼 Muscular Exoskeleton（力量套装专用） 你的护甲利用一种精心设计的外骨骼支撑着你的肌肉。当你将护甲超载，外骨骼也会补充你的运动Athletics能力。当处于超载效果中时，你的运动Athletics检定获得+1环境加值；如果你在手艺上达到大师熟练度，该加值提升为+2环境加值。
  • 异界防护 Otherworldly Protection 你使用科学并不意味着你不能用精心挑选的材料和装置制作你的护甲，以防护异界攻击。你获得等于3+你等级一半的负能量伤害抗力，如果你具有负能量治疗（例如吸血裔），你改为获得正能量伤害抗力。你也获得任意类型的阵营伤害抗力——善良，邪恶，混乱，守序——只要该伤害类型能伤害到你（注意生物不会受到给定的阵营伤害，除非其处于对立阵营；例如只有当你是善良阵营的时候才会受到邪恶伤害）。
  • 燃素校准器 Phlogistonic Regulator 你护甲中的一层隔热层能保护你不受快速的温度变化所伤。你获得等于你等级一半的寒冷和火焰伤害抗力。当处于超载效果中时，抗力提升2点。
  • 加速器 Speed Boosters 你在你的护甲中有一种能提高速度的加速器。你的速度获得+5尺状态加值，当处于超载效果中时加值提升为+10尺状态加值。
  • 消音阻尼器 Subtle Dampeners（隐秘套装专用） 你的护甲能融入并削弱噪音。当你将护甲超载，阻尼器的效果提升，能改善你的隐秘Stealth能力。当处于超载效果中，你的隐秘Stealth检定获得+1环境加值；如果你在手艺上达到大师熟练度，该加值提升为+2环境加值。
