构装体 Construct

你的大发明是一种机械生物，例如用齿轮制成的发条构装体。这是一种原型构装伙伴（32页），你可以通过在高等级选取专长调整其大部分的基础数据，例如进阶伙伴Advanced Companion。如果你使用超载Overdrive动作，你的构装体也会获得相同的超载Overdrive增益，在大失败时也会承受相同数值的火焰伤害。

你知道如何花费额外时间指挥、控制、规划你的伙伴大发明以进行一系列更复杂的动作。当你指挥你的构装伙伴时，你可以花费2个动作去指挥Command而非1个动作；你的构装伙伴就可以使用1个额外动作（通常总共是3个动作而非2个）。

选择一个初始构装改修应用在你的大发明上，你也可以选择其他你获得许可的初始伙伴改修。这些改修会改变构装体的属性或形态。

  • 高机动系统 Accelerated Mobility 灵活的肢体，轮或踏板中的高效器械，或者额外的增压器都能使你的构装体变得更快。你的大发明的速度提升至40尺。
  • 两栖结构 Amphibious Construction 强化的浮性，方向舵以及一种像是鱼尾或高能螺旋桨的推进系统让你的构装体能够在水中移动。你的大发明获得25尺游泳速度。
  • 增大体型 Increased Size 你将你的大发明造的比一般情况大得多。你的构装体是大体型。如果你具有此改修，且你的构装体大发明变成了进阶构装伙伴或通过其他方式获得了变成大体型的能力，你可以立刻将增大体型改成一个不同的初始构装改修。
  • 精密操作系统 Manual Dexterity 你的构装体大发明有铰接臂或类似的附肢，能够进行非常精确的操作。它可以使用它至多2个肢体进行操作动作。和普通的伙伴一样，它依然不能持用武器或持握不具有伙伴特征的物品，它也不能启动物品。
  • 弹丸发射器 Projectile Launcher 你的构装体架设了飞镖发射器，内置加农炮，或其他类似的武装。你的大发明获得能造成1d4钝击或穿刺伤害的远程无武装攻击（伤害类型在选取改修时决定）。该攻击具有助进特征，射程增量是30尺。
  • 传感阵列 Sensory Array 额外的传感装置为你的大发明提供了昏暗视觉和黑暗视觉，也提供了30尺的模糊的颤动感知。
  • 神奇器械 Wonder Gears 你将专业技能映射到构装体天然的智力中。你的大发明在威吓Intimidation，隐秘Stealth和生存Survival上受训。

武器 Weapon

Y你的大发明是一种看似不可能成立的武器，配置了数不胜数的罕见机关。它起始数据与你选择的一种0级常见简易或军用武器相同，或其他你获得许可的0级简易或军用武器。你可以改为使用你获得许可的1级常见简易或军用武器，但你必须为支付其价格。武器大发明可以和普通武器一样附加基础和性能符文。因为你的大发明的一些独特性质，除了你之外的所有人对其未受训，即使他们通常在简易或军用武器上受训（或更高）。如果你使用超载Overdrive动作，你可以选择将从超载中获得的额外伤害改为火焰伤害。选择一种初始武器改修应用在你的大发明上，或者选择其他你获得许可的初始武器改修。这些改修提供额外的武器特征，有时还有额外能力。改修可能给你的武器提供多用特征，但列出的伤害类型是你的武器本来就能造成的。在这种情况下，如果你选择了该改修，你可以选择一种不同伤害类型的多用特征：钝击，穿刺或挥砍。

  • 钝头弹射击 Blunt Shot（远程专用） 在需要时，你的武器大发明能够锉平弹药的锐锋，调整射击的钝化力量以传递钝击攻击并避免造成致命伤害。你的大发明获得非致命和多用B特征。你可以为大发明进行的每一次攻击选择是否要应用非致命特征。
  • 简易复杂化 Complex Simplicity（简易武器专用） 将大发明的武器伤害骰提升1级（d4到d6，d6到d8，d8到d10，d10到d12）。另外，你从下述特征中选择一种应用在大发明上：多用B，多用P，多用S。
  • 动态配重 Dynamic Weighting（单手近战武器专用；不能具有灵巧，附着或不占手特征） 你的武器精心调整的重量分布能够在提升在多手持用时的威力。你的大发明获得双手特征，伤害骰比武器通常的伤害骰大一级（例如，长剑会获得双手d10特征）。你的大发明也会获得多用B特征。
  • 纠缠形态 Entangling Form（近战专用） 你改造了你的武器，让它内置一种纠缠性的线缆或皮绳，或具有一种柔软的结构。你的大发明获得擒抱和摔绊特征。
  • 妨碍钉刺 Hampering Spikes（近战专用） 你将又长又尖的钉刺加在你的武器上，可以用来阻碍敌人的移动。你的大发明获得妨碍和多用P特征。
  • 沉重构件 Hefty Composition（近战专用） 钝化表面和坚固结构让你的武器像钉头锤一样沉重。你的大发明获得猛推和多用B特征。
  • 模块化头部 Modular Head 你为你的武器构造了一种多用途，可调整的打击面，或者制造了一种可以快速切换的特殊弹药。你的大发明获得钝击，穿刺和挥砍的模块化特征。当你交互Interact使用模块化特征，如果武器当前不具有非致命特征，你也可以选择给武器添加该特征，或移除武器当前具有的非致命特征。
  • 镇暴工具 Pacification Tools（近战专用） 柔软的材料让你的武器能用来击倒而非击杀敌人，特殊的突出物也能让你缴除敌人的武器。你的大发明获得卸武和非致命特征。你可以为大发明的每一次攻击选择是否要应用非致命特征。
  • 剃刀叉齿 Razor Prongs（近战专用） 你可以利用添加在武器上的锋利倒钩刃砍伤并击倒你的敌人。你的大发明获得摔绊和多用S特征。
  • 分段式框架 Segmented Frame 铰链，夹钳和套管组件让你的大发明变得可折叠且可调节。它获得钝击，穿刺和挥砍的模块化特征。你可以交互Interact将该物品折叠到轻负载，或将其展开会正常形态。当它折叠成轻负载时，它具有隐蔽特征，这在你用来隐藏武器的隐秘Stealth检定和DC上提供+2环境加值。

Instant Manifestation.name: 即刻显现 Instant Manifestation
Instant Manifestation.description: 你可以以不可思议的速度显现你的幻灵，你可以以单动作而不是三动作使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.n5vwBnLSlIXL9ptp]{显现幻灵 Manifest Eidolon} 。

Instinct.name: Instinct
Instinct.description:
You channel your rage through an instinct. You decide what your instinct means to you. It could be a creature or symbol beloved by your clan, or a purely internal source or filter of your rage, such as a belief, curse, heritage, or state of mind. Each instinct grants an instinct ability, plus more abilities you can gain via feats that list that instinct as a prerequisite. It also determines what damage you resist with raging resistance and, at higher levels, increases the additional damage you deal when you @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.WZUCvxqbigXos1L9]{Rage}.

Each instinct lists acts that are anathema to it. Whenever you perform such acts, you lose the instinct's abilities and any feats that list your instinct as a prerequisite until you spend 1 day of downtime re-centering yourself, though you keep all of your other barbarian abilities.

Interrogation Methodology.name: 审讯学方法论 Interrogation Methodology
Interrogation Methodology.description:
无论是因为你远生俱来的亲和力，还是对追求真相的坚决，人们不得不相信你。你自有跟他人对话的一套方式，而你已发展出一套用以获得你所调查事件之真相的审讯技术。

你在交涉上受训。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6ON8DjFXSMITZleX]{无需惊慌 No Cause For Alarm}技能专长。假如交谈时间持续1分钟或以上，你还能在交谈过程中进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{追查方向 Pursue a Lead}行动，而不是非得把时间贡献在调查方向上。举例来说，在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}的过程中，你可以将交谈对象当作方向进行追查，你也可以在某人告诉你客体的资讯时，对该客体进行追查方向行动。你还获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xccOiNL2W1EtfUYl]{针对讯问 Pointed Question}动作。

Inventive Expertise.name: 发明专家 Inventive Expertise
Inventive Expertise.description: 通过不断的创新和实验，你的发明更加高效且可靠。你发明家的职业DC提升至专家。

Inventive Mastery.name: 发明大师 Inventive Mastery
Inventive Mastery.description: 你的发明极其有效。你在发明家职业DC上的熟练度提升至大师。

Inventor Weapon Expertise.name: 发明家武器专家 Inventor Weapon Expertise
Inventor Weapon Expertise.description:
你开发了一种技巧，能更有效率地使用你的武器。你在简易和军用武器，以及无武装攻击上的熟练度提升至专家。

如果你有武器 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.jIAgXe2FetAKBwt7]{大发明}，你可以使用大发明的重击专精效果。

Inventor Weapon Mastery.name: 发明家武器大师 Inventor Weapon Mastery
Inventor Weapon Mastery.description: 你完全理解了你的武器。你在简易和军用武器，以及无武装攻击上的熟练度提升至大师。

Investigator Expertise.name: 调查员专家训练 Investigator Expertise
Investigator Expertise.description:
你将你的调查技术精练到不可思议的境界。你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{追查方向 Pursue a Lead}行动上获得的环境加值提高到+2。 您在调查员职业DC的熟练等级提升为专家。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.uA1Ofqoyi0UiZIPk]{效果: 提供线索(专家)}

如果你拥有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{侦探预备 Detective's Readiness}专长，获得@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.z4pnE8KyUdEkJmru]{效果: 提供线索(侦探预备，专家)}。

Iron Will.name: 钢铁意志 Iron Will
Iron Will.description:
炼金术士 你的心理防线如同一座钢铁堡垒。你在意志豁免上的熟练等级提升至专家。

游侠 你的训练坚定了你的决心。你意志豁免的熟练等级提升到专家。

Juggernaut.name: 钢铁之躯 Juggernaut
Juggernaut.description:
野蛮人，神卫，战士，发明家，游侠 你的身体习惯于对抗物理疼痛，并能够很好的抵抗疾病。你在强韧豁免上的熟练度提升至大师。当你在强韧豁免中骰出成功，将其改为大成功。

炼金术士 你的身体习惯于承受物理伤害和抵抗细菌与疾病。你在强韧豁免上的熟练等级提升至大师。当你在一个强韧豁免检定上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功。

魔战士 你的身体习惯于承受物理伤害和抵抗大多数疾病。你在强韧豁免上的熟练等级提升至大师等级。当你在一个强韧豁免检定上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功。

枪客 你的身体熟悉了应对艰难困苦与抵抗疾病。你强韧的熟练等级提升到大师。当你在强韧豁免骰出成功时，你会获得大成功效果。

Keen Flair.name: 锋锐华采 Keen Flair
Keen Flair.description: 不论敌人的防御如何坚实，你总是能打出毁灭性的攻击。当你以熟练等级为大师的武器或无武装攻击进行打击，骰出19且打击成功时，视为大成功。

Keen Recollection.name: 敏锐回想 Keen Recollection
Keen Recollection.description: 即使是你不擅长的主题，你也能回忆起相关的事实。你在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}上未受训技能的熟练加值等于你的等级，而不是+0。

Ki Spells.name: 真气法术 Ki Spells
Ki Spells.description:
真气法术 Ki Spells

某种超然内在的储备被称作气，你能运用气创造魔法效果。特定专长会给予你被称为真气法术的特殊法术，这是一种聚能法术。你需要消耗1点聚能点来施放聚能法术。当你初次获得真气法术时，你同时会获得拥有1点聚能点的聚能池。在每日准备时你重新填满聚能池，在10分钟的冥想内视凝神，使用再聚能行动后，你也能重获1点聚能点。

当你初次获得真气法术时，选择你的真气法术是归属于神术还是异能。你在所选魔法根源的法术攻击骰和法术DC上获得受训熟练等级，施法关键属性是感知。

聚能法术会自动升阶到你等级的一半，向上取整。获得专长能给与你更多聚能法术，并能提升聚能池的大小，但聚能池最大不会超过3点。

Laughing Shadow.name: 诡笑锋影 Laughing Shadow
Laughing Shadow.description:
魔法毫无拘束，其是你达成目的一种手段，所以你可以全凭自己所好使用它到达你所想之处，从而规避任何后果。你既是持有剑与魔法的诡笑锋影，永远快人一步，永远袖藏干坤。

当你处于奥术奔涌（Arcane Cascade）架式时，你的移动速度获得 +5尺的状态加值，如果你处于无甲状态则为+10尺。如果在架式中攻击一个 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及} 的敌人且有一只空闲手（free hand），你提高额外伤害到3点，如果你具有武器专精（weapon specialization）则为5，如果你具有高等武器专精（greater weapon specialization）则为7。你的另一只手必须完全空闲；如果你持有一件不占手（free-hand）武器或者其他物品在手里，即使你一般情况下可以使用这只手做其他事情，这个额外伤害都不会生效。

汇聚法术 Conflux Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5p9Y4ACrtRM4gTpN]{次元突袭 Dimensional Assault}

Leaf Order.name: 植物派系 Leaf Order
Leaf Order.description:
你崇敬植物与自然的恩惠，作为荒野的守望者和园丁，向人们传授可持续的技术，帮助地方从人类扩展的灾难或是疏忽中复苏。你在交涉上为受训。

你同时获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7y1BCJLrdk9mKXlc]{莱西魔宠 Leshy Familiar}德鲁伊专长。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vQuwLqtFFYt0K15N]{神莓 Goodberry}派系法术，并且你的聚能池中的聚能点增加1点。虐待植物或是毫无必要地杀害植物是你派系的禁忌。

（这并不妨碍你保护自己不受植物的伤害或是为了必要的生存而收割它们。）

Legendary Armor.name: 传奇装甲 Legendary Armor
Legendary Armor.description: 你以钢铁武装自我，正如以信仰庇护己身。你在轻甲、中甲、重甲以及无甲防御上的熟练等级提升至传奇。

Legendary Overdrive.name: 传奇超载 Legendary Overdrive
Legendary Overdrive.description: 你的超凡发明力和工艺能力强化了你的超载能力。你在手艺上获得传奇熟练度。在成功使用超载时，你将额外伤害提升到3点，替换掉从超载大师中获得的提升。

Legendary Spellcaster.name: 传奇施法者 Legendary Spellcaster
Legendary Spellcaster.description:
吟游诗人 你驱策异能魔法的能力堪称传奇。你在异能法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练等级提升至传奇。

德鲁伊 你与自然的魔法无比的和协。你原能攻击以及法术DC的熟练度提升为传奇。

先知 你能够利用他人无法比拟等级的神力。你的神术攻击骰和神术DC的熟练度提高为传奇。

Psychic As your training reaches its peak, you understand not just your own mind, but the collective unconscious from which all psychic power stems. Your proficiency ranks for occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to legendary.

术士 你在施法上展现出了卓越的天赋。你在血统所对应的魔法根源的法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练等级提升至传奇。

女巫 你对于庇护主给予的法术已经炉火纯青。你在女巫魔法根源法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升至传奇。

法师 你是个已达化境的施法者，在奥术的理论与实践层面上都有着无比全面的认知。你在奥术法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升至传奇。

Liberator.name: 解放者 Liberator
Liberator.description:
你决心守护他人的自由。你获得自由快步（Liberating Step）神卫反应以及@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 虔诚法术。在善良信条之后，添加如下信条：

  • 你必须尊重他人选择的生活，你不能强迫别人按特定方式行事，也不能威胁别人做他们不愿意做的事。
  • 你必须争取他人为自己做决定的自由并为之而战。你绝不参与或支持奴隶制和暴政。

神卫反应 Champion's Reaction

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{自由快步} R

触发 一名敌人伤害、攫抓（Grab）或擒抱（Grapple）你的盟友，并且他们都在你周围15尺的范围内。

你的盟友从束缚中重获自由。如果触发条件为盟友受到伤害，那么这名盟友在对抗触发这次自由快步的伤害时获得针对所有伤害的抗力，数值等同于2+你的等级。如果这名盟友被某个效果擒抱（Grabbing），束缚（Restraining），禁足（Immobilizing）或麻痹（Paralyzing），他们可以尝试重获自由。他们可以尝试一个新的豁免检定对抗上述效果中允许豁免的一个，或是以一个自由动作尝试从一个效果中逃脱（Escape）。如果他们能够移动，这名盟友可以以自由动作进行快步（Step），哪怕他们并不需要逃离敌人。

神圣制裁 Divine Smite9级

你将惩戒那些敢于将你的盟友囚困于束缚之中的敌人。如果触发自由快步的敌人正在使用任何使你的盟友陷入压制（Grabbed）、束缚（Restrained）、固定（Immobilized）或麻痹（Paralyzed）效果，这名敌人会承受等同于你魅力调整值的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续善良伤害}。

升格 Exalt11级

你能帮助整个团队调整站位。当你使用自由快步时，如果你的盟友没有尝试从某个状态中恢复自由，那么除了触发反应动作的那位盟友之外，你和你15尺范围内的其他盟友都能够进行快步（Step）。

Life.name: Life
Life.description:
The never-ending flow of positive energy within living beings is palpable to you. You might uphold the sanctity of life, or perhaps you seek to undermine it. You might draw power from the collective vitality of the world's living creatures, hold some connection to the Positive Energy Plane, or revere a collection of deities including Irori, Pharasma, Sarenrae, and the god of medicine Qi Zhong.

Mystery Benefit

Your body is a deep reservoir of life energy. At each level, you gain Hit Points equal to 10 + your Constitution modifier from the oracle class, instead of 8 + your Constitution modifier.

Trained Skill Medicine

Granted Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{Stabilize}

Revelation Spells

  • Initial @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2gQYrCPwBmwau26O]{Life Link};
  • Advanced @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ziHDISWkFSwz3pmn]{Delay Affliction};
  • Greater @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9kOI14Jep97TzGO7]{Life-Giving Form}

Related Domains death, healing

Curse of Outpouring Life

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.EtFMN1ZLkL7sUk01]{Effect: Life Curse}

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} and all your targets are living creatures, you roll d12s instead of d8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell level to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and positive traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11th)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry positive energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5th-level or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse positive energy in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.

Life Mystery (Multiclass).name: Life Mystery (Multiclass)
Life Mystery (Multiclass).description:
The never-ending flow of positive energy within living beings is palpable to you. You might uphold the sanctity of life, or perhaps you seek to undermine it. You might draw power from the collective vitality of the world's living creatures, hold some connection to the Positive Energy Plane, or revere a collection of deities including Irori, Pharasma, Sarenrae, and the god of medicine Qi Zhong.

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Light Armor Expertise.name: 轻甲专家 Light Armor Expertise
Light Armor Expertise.description: 你已经学会如何在穿着轻甲和无甲的情况下进行闪避。你对轻甲和无甲防御的熟练等级提升至专家。

Light Armor Mastery.name: Light Armor Mastery
Light Armor Mastery.description: Your skill with light armor improves, increasing your ability to dodge blows. Your proficiency ranks for light armor and unarmored defense increase to master.

Lightning Reflexes.name: 闪电反射 Lightning Reflexes
Lightning Reflexes.description: 你的反射如闪电般快。你在反射豁免上的熟练度提升至专家。

Link Spells.name: 灵渠法术 Link Spells
Link Spells.description:
你与幻灵的链接让你可以施展灵渠法术，这是你和幻灵之间共享的连接所塑造的特殊法术。灵渠法术是一种聚能法术。你需要消耗1点聚能点以施展聚能法术，你初始会拥有一个1聚能点的聚能池。你在每日准备时会重新充满你的聚能池，你也可以花费10分钟，使用再聚能行动以重新获得1点聚能点。你的再聚能行动通常是与你的幻灵深入交心，共同玩耍，或者一起冥想，思考你们之间羁绊的本质。

聚能法术自动升阶到你的等级一半（取高），类似戏法。聚能法术不需要法术位，你也不能通过法术位施展聚能法术。专长能为你提供更多的聚能法术并扩大你的聚能池，但你的聚能池永远不能容纳超过3点聚能点。

你学会了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lV8FkHZtzZu7Cy6j]{进化浪潮 Evolution Surge}灵渠法术，为你的幻灵提供多种有用的战斗增益之一。

灵渠戏法 Link Cantrips

灵渠戏法是特殊的灵渠法术，不消耗聚能点，因此你能随意施展。通常只有专长才能为你提供更多的灵渠戏法。与戏法不同，你不能将灵渠戏法交换为较高等级的召唤师专长所提供的其他灵渠戏法，除非你通过重训交换特定的专长。

你学会了@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HStu2Yhw3iQER9tY]{激励幻灵 Boost Eidolon}灵渠戏法，能简单地强化幻灵的能力，让他能以更强大的力量进行攻击。

Lore.name: Lore
Lore.description:
Knowledge and information come freely to you. You might use this lore to gain power or perhaps to understand the divine mysteries of the multiverse. You might have a conduit to the fabled Akashic Record, maintain a subtle telepathic connection to the collective subconscious of all living creatures, or follow in the footsteps of deities such as Abadar, Irori, Nethys, Irori's scholarly nephew Gruhastha, the fey triune goddess of fate Magdh, or the lawful aeon god-figure known as the Monad.

Mystery Benefit

You hold more mystical knowledge within you than most. You have one additional spell in your repertoire of each level you can cast.

Trained Skill Occultism and one Lore skill of your choice

Granted Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}

Revelation Spells

  • Initial @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k2QrUk7jWMAWozMh]{Brain Drain};
  • Advanced @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LbPLNWlLCxKCo5gF]{Access Lore};
  • Greater @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XULNb8ItUsfupxqH]{Dread Secret}

Related Domains knowledge, truth

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.Tju9kpQlwcKkyKor]{Effect: Lore Curse}

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Minor Curse

You take a -4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

Moderate Curse

The flow of information through your mind grows. The attention you divert to process this huge influx of information means you are always @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.

At the start of each of your turns, you automatically make one check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} as a free action. This uses a skill of your choice that has the Recall Knowledge action, using a result equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus in that skill (with no other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

Major Curse (11th)

The massive flow of information clouding your mind overwhelms your ability to communicate with others. You can understand all languages, but you can't speak, use linguistic effects, or otherwise communicate with your allies.

If you Cast a Spell with a verbal component, you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the spell is lost.

You gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against linguistic effects.

Lore Mystery (Multiclass).name: Lore Mystery (Multiclass)
Lore Mystery (Multiclass).description:
Knowledge and information come freely to you. You might use this lore to gain power or perhaps to understand the divine mysteries of the multiverse. You might have a conduit to the fabled Akashic Record, maintain a subtle telepathic connection to the collective subconscious of all living creatures, or follow in the footsteps of deities such as Abadar, Irori, Nethys, Irori's scholarly nephew Gruhastha, the fey triune goddess of fate Magdh, or the lawful aeon god-figure known as the Monad.

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Maestro.name: 大师 Maestro
Maestro.description: 你的缪斯是一位大师，激励你攀登高峰。如果是一个生物，那它可能是爱好表演的如咏唱天使（choral angel）或者翼蛇人爱塔；如果是一个神，可能是@Compendium[pf2e.deities.gxwmzxUWBOhdgFSN]{莎琳 Shelyn}。作为大师缪斯的诗人，你会激励你的盟友，对你的音乐和口才能力充满自信。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sVjATEo8eqkAosNp]{绕梁组曲 Lingering Composition}专长，将@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{安抚术 Soothe}加入你的法术库。

Magical Fortitude.name: 魔法强健 Magical Fortitude
Magical Fortitude.description:
先知，术士，法师 魔法之力强化了你身体的弹性。你的强韧豁免熟练度提升至专家。

女巫 你的庇护主的力量增加了你身体的韧性，你的强韧豁免增加到专家。

Magnum Opus.name: 代表作 Magnum Opus
Magnum Opus.description: 你已经将施法完美调谐。将两个常见10级异能法术加入你的法术库。你获得一个10级法术位，可以使用诗人施法能力施展这两个法术之一。你在升级时不会获得更多的10级法术位，不像其他法术，你不能在10级法术位上使用获得更多法术位，或者让你在不消耗法术位的情况下施法的能力。

Major Curse.name: Major Curse
Major Curse.description:
You've learned to better balance the conflicting powers wreaking havoc on your body. Immediately after completing the casting of a revelation spell while you are affected by your moderate curse, your curse progresses to its major effect, rather than overwhelming you. This effect lasts until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus}, which reduces your curse to its minor effect. If you cast a revelation spell while under the effects of your major curse, you are overwhelmed by your curse.

In addition, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool from 2 to 3. If you spend at least 2 Focus Points before you again Refocus, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

Master Detective.name: 侦探大师 Master Detective
Master Detective.description:
作为一名侦探大师，你能处理任何事件并找出所有可用的线索。如果你正在对客体进行追查方向行动，并且你进入一处有着另一个直指解决谜团线索的新地点，GM会告诉你线索的存在与类型：是一件物体、一个人、法术效果或诸如此类。

当你找到线索时，GM会告诉你你已经找到了。如果该处地点不止有一个线索，GM会择一告诉你。当你在该处找到任何线索后，GM会告诉你你已经找到了，就算这个线索不是GM选的，或此处还有其他你没有找到的线索。

你在调查员职业DC的熟练等级提升为大师。

Master Overdrive.name: 超载专家 Master Overdrive
Master Overdrive.description: 你提升了你的手艺技能，你可以将设备推入更强力的超载状态。你在手艺上获得专家熟练度，在成功使用超载Overdrive时，你将额外伤害提升1点。

Master Spellcaster.name: 大师施法者 Master Spellcaster
Master Spellcaster.description:
吟游诗人 你成为了异能大师。你在异能法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练等级提升至大师

德鲁伊 原能魔法听从你的指令。你原能攻击以及法术DC的熟练度提升为大师。

魔战士 你凭借大师级造诣强化你的法术。你在奥术法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升至大师等级。

先知 你理解了自己秘示域中深邃而复杂的神力。你的神术攻击骰和神术DC的熟练等级提高为大师。

Psychic You’ve gained access to the deepest corners of your own mind. Your proficiency ranks for occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to master.

术士 你已经完全驾驭住了流淌在血液中的魔力。你在血统所对应的魔法根源的法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练等级提升至大师。

召唤师 你与幻灵之间的联结极其强大，能够让你掌握联结法术的精髓。你在幻灵根源上的法术攻击骰和法术DC的熟练等级提升至大师。

女巫 你掌握了庇护主的法术。你在女巫魔法根源法术攻击骰和法术DC上的熟练度提升至大师。

Master Strike.name: 大师一击 Master Strike
Master Strike.description: 你仅仅用一击就可以让放松警惕的敌人再起不能。你的游荡者职业DC提升至大师。你可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Rlp7ND33yYfxiEWi]{大师一击 Master Strike}自由动作。

Master Strikes.name: 大师技击 Master Strikes
Master Strikes.description: 你已将身体锻炼成兵器一般。你的无武装攻击和简易武器的熟练等级提升为大师。

Master Tricks.name: 大师技巧 Master Tricks
Master Tricks.description: 你掌握了游荡者的战斗方法。你在简易武器与无武装攻击，细剑，闷棍，短弓，短剑和无武装攻击上的熟练度提升至大师。

Masterful Hunter.name: Masterful Hunter
Masterful Hunter.description:
You have honed your abilities as a hunter to incredible levels. Your proficiency rank for your ranger class DC increases to master. When using a ranged weapon that you have master proficiency in, you can ignore the penalty if attacking your hunted prey within the weapon's second and third range increments.

If you have master proficiency in Perception, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when you Seek your prey, and if you have master proficiency in Survival, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Survival checks when you Track your prey. You also gain an additional benefit depending on your hunter's edge.

Masterful Hunter (Flurry).name: 大师猎手（连击） Masterful Hunter (Flurry)
Masterful Hunter (Flurry).description:
大师猎手额外增益17级

你可以将对武器的掌控和熟练的瞄准融合，进行多次精准攻击。

如果你对武器的熟练等级为大师，你同一轮对猎杀目标的多次攻击减值变为，第二次攻击-2（使用灵巧武器-1），第三次和后续攻击-4（使用灵巧武器-2）。

Masterful Hunter (Outwit).name: 大师猎手（机智） Masterful Hunter (Outwit)
Masterful Hunter (Outwit).description:
大师猎手额外增益17级

你对于多种技能的擅长让你能够轻易击败猎物。

如果你在唬骗、威慑、隐匿或者你用来回忆关于猎物知识的技能上拥有大师熟练，你使用该技能对抗猎物的环境加值从+2提升到+4.如果你对你的护甲拥有大师熟练，你对抗猎物的ac环境加值从+1提升到+2。

Automation Notes: The bonus to recall knowledge has been set up for arcana, crafting, nature, occultism, religion, and society only. The bonus to AC is based on your unarmored proficiency, and not on the proficiency of the armor you're wearing.

Masterful Hunter (Precision).name: 大师猎手（精准） Masterful Hunter (Precision)
Masterful Hunter (Precision).description:
大师猎手额外增益17级

你的武器掌控允许你多次击中猎杀目标的致命部位。

你在一轮中第二次击中猎杀目标的时候也会造成1d8精准伤害。

19级时第二次击中目标会造成2d8精准伤害，第三次击中目标会造成1d8精准伤害。

Mastermind.name: 首脑 Mastermind
Mastermind.description:
其他游荡者们想达成目标依赖的是妙手空空或巧舌如簧，你则是凭借着智慧去雕琢错综复杂的计划。你喜欢把事情弄得像下棋一样，当别人只想了三步时你已经规划了十步之远。你可能是侦破犯罪的侦探，或服膺于实权家族或国家的间谍大师。如果你走在法律之外，那你可能是位犯罪首脑或情报掮客，非常懂得知人善用。

如果你成功用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}辨认出一位生物，直到你下一回合开始，该生物对你的攻击视为@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}；如果大成功，对你的攻击视为措手不及的时间会持续1分钟。

你在社群和下列一项技能上达到受训：奥术、自然、神秘或宗教。你可以选择智力作为你的职业关键属性。

Medium Armor Expertise.name: 中甲专家 Medium Armor Expertise
Medium Armor Expertise.description: 你学会了如何从攻击中更好地保护自己。你在轻甲，中甲和无甲防御上的熟练度提升至专家。如果你有中甲或重甲大发明，你能使用护甲大发明的重击专精效果。

Medium Armor Mastery.name: 中甲大师 Medium Armor Mastery
Medium Armor Mastery.description: 你非常擅长改良护甲，让你避免更多的攻击。你在轻甲和中甲，以及无甲防御上的熟练度提升至大师。

Metal Strikes.name: 钢拳击 Metal Strikes
Metal Strikes.description: 驱动肉体进行无武装攻击时，你能注入稀有金属的神秘能量。你的无武装攻击可视为寒铁制和银制。这使你能对一系列例如恶魔、魔鬼和精类等的超自然生物造成更多伤害。

Metamagical Experimentation.name: 超魔实验 Metamagical Experimentation
Metamagical Experimentation.description: 你了解到被称为超魔的实践技艺其实从很久以前就开始了，那时候的法师必须自己设计法术与变化，而不是像现在倚靠他人记载与流传的法术。此论题能让你有效使用各种超魔专长。你获得一个1级超魔法师专长作为奖励专长。4级开始，在你进行每日准备时，你可以选择一个等级需求不超过你等级一半的超魔法师专长，你可以使用此超魔专长直到你进行下一次每日准备。

Methodology.name: 方法论 Methodology
Methodology.description:
你的研究让你在各个领域颇有建树，但有一种特别引起了你的兴趣。选择一个方法论。本书介绍的方法论如下：

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ln2Y1a4SxlU9sizX]{炼金科学方法论 Alchemical Sciences Methodology}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.g3mNzNphtVxyR9Xr]{经验主义方法论 Empiricism Methodology}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.O3IX7rTxXWWvDVM3]{法医学方法论 Forensic Medicine Methodology}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.UIHUNNYZyQ3p4Vmo]{审讯学方法论 Interrogation Methodology}

Mighty Rage.name: Mighty Rage
Mighty Rage.description:
Your rage intensifies and lets you burst into action. Your proficiency rank for your barbarian class DC increases to expert.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.74iat04PtfG8gn2Q]{Mighty Rage} free action.

Miraculous Spell.name: 神话法术 Miraculous Spell
Miraculous Spell.description: 你受到神祇的眷顾，获得了真正超凡法术。你获得一个10环级法术位，并且可以通过神术施法在此法术位准备一个法术。对于那些让你能不消耗法术位施法或能让你换取更多法术位的能力来说，你无法使用该法术位。你不会随着等级提升获得更多10环级法术，但你可以通过@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QDjpZKOrWIV1G8XJ]{传奇化身 Maker of Miracles}专长获得一个额外法术位。

Monk Expertise.name: 武僧专家训练 Monk Expertise
Monk Expertise.description: 武僧职业DC的熟练等级提升为专家。若你已学会真气法术，你在使用真气法术的魔法根源上的法术攻击和法术DC，会提升为专家熟练等级。

Mosquito Witch Patron.name: Mosquito Witch Patron
Mosquito Witch Patron.description:
Few in Shimmerford or elsewhere would be foolish enough to attempt to draw the Mosquito Witch's attention, but whether you're one of those foolish few or simply someone who attracted the Mosquito Witch's attention unwittingly or unwillingly, she grants you powers over insects and other arthropods.

法术表 primal

庇护主技能 Nature

巫术戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BItahht2hEHvR9Bt]{Buzzing Bites}

赠送法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}

Muses.name: 缪斯 Muses
Muses.description:
作为诗人，你在1级时需要选择一个缪斯。这一缪斯将你引向伟大之物，它可以是一个实际存在的生物，一个神明，一种哲学，或者一种迷人的神秘存在。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.4ripp6EfdVpS0d60]{谜团 Enigma}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.YMBsi4bndRAk5CX4]{大师 Maestro}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.y0jGimYdMGDJWrEq]{博学 Polymath}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.N03BtRvjX9TeHRa4]{武者 Warrior}

Mutagenist.name: Mutagenist
Mutagenist.description:
You focus on bizarre mutagenic transformations that sacrifice one aspect of a creature's physical or psychological being in order to strengthen another. You start with the formulas for two 1st-level mutagens in your formula book, in addition to your other formulas.

Your research field adds a number of formulas to your formula book; these are your signature items. When using a batch of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Infused Reagents} to create your signature items using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy}, you create three items instead of two. Each time you gain a level, you can swap one of your signature items with another formula in your formula book. This new signature item must be on your research field's list of possible signature items.

You gain the following free action.

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.00LNVSCbwJ8pszwE]{Mutagenic Flashback}

Frequency once per day

You experience a brief resurgence of a mutagen. Choose one mutagen you've consumed since your last daily preparations. You gain the effects of that mutagen for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.V4Jt7eDnJBLv5bDj]{Field Discovery}Level 5

When using Advanced Alchemy to make mutagens during your daily preparations, you can use a batch of reagents to create any three mutagens instead of just two of the same mutagen.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Dug1oaVYejLmYEFt]{Perpetual Infusions}Level 7

You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items. You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using Quick Alchemy without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Choose two of the following formulas: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.IQK9N2mEOyAj3iWU]{Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wbr6rkyaVYnDhdgV]{Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xE0EdDrf734l2fQH]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5MKBwpE401uz4kNN]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.bOPQDM54W8ZDoULY]{Serene Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YwRAHWW8yUI07sy9]{Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)}.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.mZFqRLYOQEqKA8ri]{Perpetual Potency}Level 11

Your perpetual infusions improve, allowing you to use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create more powerful items with no cost. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

The moderate versions of the mutagens you chose for perpetual infusions.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.1BKdOJ0HNL6Eg3xw]{Greater Field Discovery}Level 13

If you imbibe another mutagen while you are under the effects of a mutagen that you created, you can gain the benefits and the drawbacks of both mutagens at once, despite the fact that they both have the polymorph trait and would not normally function together.

If you come under the effects of any further mutagens while benefiting from two mutagens, you lose the benefit of one of the former mutagens of your choice, while retaining the drawbacks of all the mutagens.

If you are under the effects of two mutagens and you come under the effect of a non-mutagen polymorph effect, you lose the benefits of the mutagens while retaining the drawbacks of both.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.CGetAmSbv06fW7GT]{Perpetual Perfection}Level 17

You have perfected your perpetual infusions, allowing you to use Quick Alchemy to create even more powerful items at no cost. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

The greater versions of the mutagens you chose for perpetual infusions.

Mystery.name: 秘示域 Mystery
Mystery.description:
选择提供给你力量的神力秘示域。

你的秘示域可能是神明对泛神论者奉献的回报，对某个特定主义的尊崇，或和某个神力之源的链接。不管其起源和本质如何，你的秘示域都将决定你能施放的启示法术和萦绕汝身的先知诅咒。你会习得秘示域关联的技能，获得一个戏法，获得一系列秘示域相关的神术知识和技巧。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]{先祖 Ancestors}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{战争 Battle}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]{骸骨 Bones}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RI2EMRBBPNSoTJXu]{宇宙 Cosmos}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.GTSvbFb36InvuH0w]{烈焰 Flames}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]{生命 Life}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.tZBb3Kh4nJcNoUFI]{知识 Lore}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY]{风暴 Tempest}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.EslxR2sbDK9XJaAl]{时间 Time}

阅读秘示域条目

一个秘示域条目包含以下信息，后附对秘示域诅咒的描述。

秘示域增益 秘示域增益是你从秘示域中获得的一种或多种特殊能力。

受训技能 你将在列出的技能上受训。某些秘示域提供多个技能受训。

授予戏法 除了通过神术施法获得的之外，你自动将这个戏法加到你的法术库中。

启示法术 你在1级的时候自动获得该秘示域的初始启示法术，并且可以通过@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FPVe3o7YctBicSQa]{进阶启示 Advanced Revelation}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HSW3N9pfHhM7upRB]{高等启示 Greater Revelation}和@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2HeRmbcHcsRMccir]{异色秘示域 Diverse Mystery}等专长获得更多的启示法术。

关联领域 这些是与你的秘示域有关的牧师领域。你在1级时从这些领域中选择一个，并选择该领域的一个初始领域法术，然后可将其作为拥有咒缚特征的启示法术施放。

Mystic Strikes.name: 魔拳击 Mystic Strikes
Mystic Strikes.description: 你将意志集中到物理攻击上，为其注入魔法能量。你的无武装攻击被魔化，能击穿对非魔法攻击的抗力。不过，你依然需要一件类似@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{重拳绑带 Handwraps of Mighty Blows (+1)}之类的物品来使攻击骰获得物品加值或增加攻击的武器伤害骰。

Nature's Edge.name: Nature's Edge
Nature's Edge.description: You always find the weak points in your foes' defenses when they're on unfavorable terrain. Enemies are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to you if they're in natural difficult terrain or in difficult terrain resulting from a snare.

Necromancy.name: 死灵学派 Necromancy
Necromancy.description: 身为死灵师，你驱使生与死之力。尽管你的学派常因为与复苏不死生物相关而遭到蔑视，但你知晓如何控制生命，意味着你知道如何治癒。你的法术书多一个1环死灵系法术(例如 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k34hDOfIIMAxNL4a]{残酷触手 Grim Tendrils}) 。你学到了 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BH3sUerzMb2bWnv1]{墓地之音 Call of the Grave} 学派法术。

Night Patron.name: 暗夜庇护主 Night Patron
Night Patron.description:
你的庇护主藏身夜影之中，赋予你支配黑暗及梦境的威能。

法术表 异能

庇护主技能 神秘

巫术戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.cE7PRAX8Up7fmYef]{复眼暗夜 Shroud of Night}

赠送法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{睡眠术 Sleep}

Occult Spellcasting.name: 异能施法 Occult Spellcasting
Occult Spellcasting.description:
你通过隐秘的知识获得魔法能力。你可以使用施展法术动作施放异能魔法，并且你可以在施展法术的时候提供材料、姿势和语言成分（见302页施展法术）。因为你是一名诗人，你通常可以用演奏乐器来满足法术要求的姿势或者材料成分，只需要你占用至少一只手进行演奏，如果你使用乐器，你就不需要使用法术材料包或者空出另一只手。你通常还可以进行演奏而非说话来满足法术需要的语言成分。

每天，你最多可以施展两个1级法术。你只能施展你的已知法术，并且你可以通过法术库职业能力进行学习。你每天可以施展法术的数量被称为你的法术位。

当你在诗人职业上提升等级时，你每天可以施展法术的数量，与你可以施展法术的最高等级同样会提高。

有些法术要求你尝试一次法术攻击骰来决定它们的有效程度，或者要求你的敌人对抗你的法术DC掷骰（通常为尝试一次豁免投）。因为你的关键属性为魅力，你的法术攻击骰和法术DC都使用你的魅力调整值。

Offensive Boost.name: 攻势增压 Offensive Boost
Offensive Boost.description:
你为你的大发明制作了一些附件以升级它的攻击能力。你的增强件让依赖你大发明做出的任何打击造成额外1d6点伤害，伤害类型由你选择的增压而定。如果你的大发明是护甲，增压应用到你的近战无武装打击，或在使用每日准备时选择的一把武器进行的打击上；如果你的大发明是构装体，增压应用在你的构装伙伴的打击上；如果你的大发明是武器，增压应用在你使用大发明进行的打击上。你可以花费休整期，按照切换改修的方式切换成不同的增压。从下列增压中选择一个，伤害类型在括号中列出。

  • 冻寒Chill（寒冷） 你的大发明快速吸收热量，产生强烈的寒意。
  • 爆燃Ignition（火焰）你的大发明能喷出几束灼热的火焰。
  • 震电Jolt（电击） 你的大发明利用储存的电能震慑你的敌人。
  • 动量Momentum（钝击） 你的大发明以额外的动量猛撞敌人。
  • 锯齿Saws（挥砍） 你的大发明在攻击时展开回旋利齿。
  • 尖刺Spike（穿刺） 你的大发明在攻击时展开恶毒的尖刺。
  • 酸蚀Vitriol（酸液） 你的大发明会喷出腐蚀性强酸。

On the Case.name: 调查事件 On the Case
On the Case.description: 作为一名调查员，您将自己的冒险视为等解决的事件。您获得可用于调查事件的一个行动与一个反应动作：@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{追查方向 Pursue a Lead}和@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{提供线索 Clue In}。

Opportune Riposte.name: 适时反击 Opportune Riposte
Opportune Riposte.description: 你在敌人失手之际，利用他的失败扭转局面。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{适时反击 Opportune Riposte}反应动作。

Oracular Clarity.name: Oracular Clarity
Oracular Clarity.description:
You now fully grasp the nature of the divine power behind your mystery, allowing you to work magic akin to miracles. Add two common 10th-level divine spells to your repertoire. You gain a single 10th-level spell slot you can use to cast one of those two spells using oracle spellcasting.

You don't gain more 10th-level spells as you level up, unlike other spell slots, and you can't use 10th-level slots with abilities that give you more spell slots or that let you cast spells without expending spell slots. You can take the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PExiZZTSP4p7TZaW]{Oracular Providence} feat to gain a second slot.

Oracular Curse.name: Oracular Curse
Oracular Curse.description:
Drawing on multiple disparate sources of power inevitably places an incredible stress on your body, manifesting as a supernatural curse. The more revelation spells you cast, the worse the effects of your curse, but these increasingly conflicting energies can also provide you with divine benefits.

The specific effects of your curse are tied to your mystery, but all curses follow the same progression. A curse continually gives you a mild but constant reminder that you carry otherworldly power. As you cast revelation spells, your curse intensifies, first to a minor effect and then to a moderate effect.

Your curse progresses to its minor stage the first time you finish casting a revelation spell after your daily preparations. Once your minor curse has manifested, it remains in effect until you rest for 8 hours and again make your daily preparations. If you cast a revelation spell while your minor curse is in effect, you progress to the moderate curse effect immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. The minor effect continues to affect you, though some moderate curse effects might alter the specifics of your minor curse. At higher levels, you can cast more revelation spells, progressing your curse to its major stage and then an extreme stage; these stronger curses are cumulative with the effects of the lower stages and can alter them. When you Refocus while under the effects of your moderate or stronger curse, you reduce your curse's severity to minor in addition to regaining a Focus Point.

Drawing upon your mystery's power while your curse is at its worst causes an irreconcilable conflict between you and the sources of your power. Immediately after casting a revelation spell while under the moderate effect of your curse, you are overwhelmed. While overwhelmed, you can't Cast or Sustain any revelation spells-you effectively lose access to those spells. You can still Refocus to reduce the effects of your curse and regain a Focus Point, but doing so doesn't allow you to cast further revelation spells. These effects last until you rest for 8 hours and make your daily preparations, at which point your curse returns to its basic state. At higher levels, you can grow to withstand your curse's major and even extreme effects, enabling you to cast more revelation spells without becoming overwhelmed.

Your curse has the curse, divine, and necromancy traits. You can't mitigate, reduce, or remove the effects of your oracular curse by any means other than Refocusing and resting for 8 hours. For example, if your curse makes creatures concealed from you, you can't negate that concealed condition through a magic item or spell, such as true strike (though you would still benefit from the other effects of that item or spell). Likewise, remove curse and similar spells don't affect your curse at all.

Order of the Chain.name: Order of the Chain
Order of the Chain.description:
Members of the Order of the Chain are skilled at hunting down and capturing criminals, especially those who dare flee from justice.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AGiIjgLOFuahmwiT]{Shackles of Law}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XOAtP64xiSRIofsY]{Sturdy Bindings}

Order of the Gate.name: Order of the Gate
Order of the Gate.description:
Favored Weapon @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]{Dagger}

The Hellknight signifers of the Order of the Gate seek to prevent lawlessness of all types through the use of their considerable spellcasting prowess and command of fiendish outsiders.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jrDCPvkruz8y740Z]{Locate Lawbreakers}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.w7dOgJvqAqyqSeSQ]{Devil Allies}

Order of the Godclaw.name: Order of the Godclaw
Order of the Godclaw.description:
Favored Weapon @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5fu6dCtqhdBnHNqh]{Morningstar}

The Order of the Godclaw's Hellknights see their cause as a holy mandate from the Godclaw. They seek to punish criminals with a zeal rarely matched by others who enforce the law.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UHejQS4uCNGRI45t]{Dedication to the Five}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cMkpLgadlLCzDOv0]{Blessings of the Five}

Order of the Nail.name: Order of the Nail
Order of the Nail.description:
Favored Weapons @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dgWxsYm0DWHb27h6]{Halberd}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.OPMzQdM9rZznMGhW]{Lance}

Members of the Order of the Nail see civilized society as an ideal and seek to unite all people within their cultural baseline. They also seek to destroy anyone who does not accept Chelaxian culture along with the wild beasts that threaten the safety of civilization.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PpJURSJFEHzhutdp]{Trailblazing Stride}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PPSH5vdf90KC95jJ]{Reveal Beasts}

Order of the Pyre.name: Order of the Pyre
Order of the Pyre.description:
Favored Weapon @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vlnzTSsRmWeSkt9O]{Glaive}

The Order of the Pyre is dedicated to eliminating those faiths and beliefs they consider to be a threat to the Inner Sea region. They are particularly keen on stamping out dangerous cults.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Kz4E8heU12IGcYoi]{Righteous Resistance}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FlsAYAGEiZg1gg7D]{Spiritual Disruption}

Order of the Rack.name: Order of the Rack
Order of the Rack.description:
Favored Weapons @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}

Members of the Order of the Rack seek to eliminate wastefulness throughout the Inner Sea region. They seek to quash pointless dreams, quell rebellions, and destroy dangerous inventions.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RkvAuikI0kIZlQTU]{Disillusionment}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tPhhaCbaQqwenkzx]{Silence Heresy}

Order of the Scourge.name: Order of the Scourge
Order of the Scourge.description:
Favored Weapons @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9iDqOLNFKxiTcFKE]{Mace}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.I5DJUbAFGMwa6qCz]{Scourge}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}

Hellknights of the Order of the Scourge hunt those who pervert the law for their own selfish ends. They seek to destroy corruption and those who hide behind unjust laws and bureaucracy.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AxjjAoU1IZaNUGGS]{Fear No Law, Fear No One}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1xpqOpguTUAeFsdO]{Seek Injustice}

Outwit.name: 机智 Outwit
Outwit.description: 你拥有使用智慧战胜和回避敌人的天赋。你在唬骗、威慑、隐匿和任何回想关于猎物知识的检定上获得+2环境加值，对抗猎物攻击的ac上获得+1环境加值。

Overdrive.name: 超载 Overdrive
Overdrive.description: 你有一大堆自己发明的小设备，从肌肉刺激器到冲击活塞。若需要，你可以 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3D9kGfwg4LUZBR9A]{超载} 这些设备来辅助你的战斗。

Paladin.name: 圣武士 Paladin
Paladin.description:
你光荣而正直，誓要击退一切残酷暴行。你获得报应打击（Retributive Strike）神卫反应，以及 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗Lay on Hands} 虔诚法术。在善良信条之后，添加如下信条：

  • 你必须依荣誉行事，绝不依靠谎言、欺骗和利用他人来获取优势。
  • 无论身在何方，你必须尊重正当统治者治下的合法当局的权威，遵守它们的法律。

神卫反应 Champion's Reaction

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{报应打击} R

触发 一名敌人伤害了你的盟友，并且他们都在你周围15尺的范围内。

你保护你的盟友并痛击你的敌人。这位盟友在对抗触发这次报应打击的伤害时获得针对所有伤害的抗力，数值等同于2+你的等级。如果这名敌人在你的触及范围之内，你对其进行一次近战打击（Strike）。

神圣制裁 Divine Smite9级

你以惩戒光环包围邪恶目标。如果你的报应打击命中，那么目标会受到等同于你魅力调整值的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续善良伤害} 。

升格 Exalt11级

当你使用报应打击时，每个在你和目标周围15尺内，且目标处于他们近战触及内的盟友都可以花费一个反应动作以-5的减值对其进行打击（Strike）。

Panache.name: 派头 Panache
Panache.description:
你认为行动中采取的做法与行动的结果同样重要。当你用特别夸张的方式行动时，你能趁这光彩夺目的时刻，进行华丽又致命的战法。这种绚烂的状态被称为派头。你要不处于派头状态，要不就没有。

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.uBJsxCzNhje8m8jj]{效果：派头}

你借由执行与特定华丽行为相关的技能检定获取派头，且这些华丽的行为包括@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{翻滚 Tumble Through}以及浪客风格所指定的动作。依照GM判断，在你通过检定成功执行特别大胆的动作后，例如拉着吊灯摆荡、乘着布幔滑下等，若检定结果够高(一般为符合你等级的非常困难DC，但GM可以选择不同的阈值)，你也可取得派头。

当你持有派头时，你在速度上获得+5尺状态加值，且在翻滚或任何因为你的风格而会给你派头的行动上获得+1环境加值。当你有派头时，精确打击职业能力会让你造成额外伤害。你必须拥有派头才能使用强大的终结动作(包含稳妥终结)，并且这会让你失去你的派头。

一般来说，你只有在战斗遭遇中才能获得与使用派头，当遭遇结束时，你失去派头。

Path to Perfection.name: 完美之道 Path to Perfection
Path to Perfection.description: 你已规划出自己的通往觉悟的路。选择强韧、反射或意志豁免。在所选豁免的熟练等级上提升为大师。当你投所选豁免时，若为成功，则替换为大成功。

Path to Perfection (Fortitude).name: Path to Perfection (Fortitude)
Path to Perfection (Fortitude).description:
You have progressed along your own path to enlightenment.

Choose your Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saving throw. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. When you roll a success on the chosen saving throw, you get a critical success instead.

Path to Perfection (Reflex).name: Path to Perfection (Reflex)
Path to Perfection (Reflex).description:
You have progressed along your own path to enlightenment.

Choose your Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saving throw. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. When you roll a success on the chosen saving throw, you get a critical success instead.

Path to Perfection (Will).name: Path to Perfection (Will)
Path to Perfection (Will).description:
You have progressed along your own path to enlightenment.

Choose your Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saving throw. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. When you roll a success on the chosen saving throw, you get a critical success instead.

Patron.name: 庇护主 Patron
Patron.description:
你并非生来就擅长施法，也未曾花数年时间精钻细研书本中的奥秘，你的力量来源于一个未知的存在，你被选中作为其不可言知计划的棋子为其效劳。这个存在通常神秘而遥远，只会揭露祂的部分身份与动机，通过作为渠道的女巫魔宠与你连接，来赐予你法术和其他魔法力量。

庇护主可能是某路神祇或半神、强大的鬼婆战团，精类领主，魔鬼大公，或是其他相似的单独或集群的存在。随者你获得更多庇护主的力量时，你会对其有更多了解——可以借由所传授奥义与教诲的组合来反推其身分与目的——但是庇护主赋予女巫力量是出于秘密原因，一般不会完全揭露其底牌。

1级时，选择庇护主的奥义，这将决定你的法术根源、受训技能、获得的特殊戏法以及魔宠所学会的法术。

Patron Theme.name: 庇护主奥义 Patron Theme
Patron Theme.description:
不论其本质或身份，每个庇护主都有一个奥义。这个奥义决定了庇护主具体赐给了女巫什么样的威能。某些庇护主有许多面相，授予麾下各个女巫不同的奥义与教诲。你的庇护主奥义决定了下列数据：

  • 法术表 你以这个魔法根源施法并使用此根源的法术表。
  • 庇护主技能 你在此技能上受训。
  • 巫术戏法 你获得此特殊巫术戏法。
  • 赠送法术 你的魔宠自动学会此法术，这不计入你获得女巫施法能力时学会的法术中。

Patron's Gift.name: 庇护主赠礼 Patron's Gift
Patron's Gift.description:
庇护主给予你控制不可思议的魔法的能力，你获得一个10级法术位，并且可以使用女巫施法能力准备这个法术位。

不同于其他法术位，你不会因为等级提升而获得更多10环法术位，且诸如无需花费法术位施法的能力或是给予更多法术位的能力都无法对它们起效，但你可以选择@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SelPslNtTfzxp7fs]{庇护主真传 Patron's Truth}专长来取得第2个10级法术位。

Peerless Inventor.name: 超凡发明家 Peerless Inventor
Peerless Inventor.description: 你不断发明，你的手艺技能不可质疑。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XR95taODq1sq82Du]{发明家} 技能专长，即使你不满足先决条件。

Perfected Form.name: 完美体势 Perfected Form
Perfected Form.description: 你剔除掉动作里的杂质。每轮你的第一次打击时，若骰出小于10的值，可将攻击骰视为骰出10。这是一个幸运效果。

Perpetual Infusions.name: Perpetual Infusions
Perpetual Infusions.description:
You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items.

You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Perpetual Infusions (Bomber).name: Perpetual Infusions (Bomber)
Perpetual Infusions (Bomber).description:
You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items.

You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Choose two of the following formulas:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.M1k5QQc1qQLxzyCK]{Acid Flask (Lesser)},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.yd3kEK21YknZLlcT]{Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AFR01HVd7DcZvkpP]{Bottled Lightning (Lesser)},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.EpxmUtLpCkE8R6KJ]{Frost Vial (Lesser)},

  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Xnqglykl3Cif8rN9]{Thunderstone (Lesser)}.

Perpetual Infusions (Chirurgeon).name: Perpetual Infusions (Chirurgeon)
Perpetual Infusions (Chirurgeon).description:
You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items.

You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ktjFOp3U0wQD9t0Z]{Lesser Antidote} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UqinuuCWePTYGhVO]{Lesser Antiplague}.

Choose two common 5th-level or lower alchemical poisons.

Polymath.name: 博学 Polymath
Polymath.description: 你的缪斯是万事通，涉足于不同的技能与爱好。如果是一个生物，那它可能是如精类的善变物种；如果是神明，可能是戴斯那或者卡莉斯翠。作为博学缪斯的诗人，你对大量的课题都拥有兴趣但是很少专注于其中之一，你也很少下定决心——你想尝试所有事物。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jBp91q4uzwd4FeSX]{多样表演 Versatile Performance} 专长，将 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{隐形仆役 Unseen Servant} 加入你的法术库。

Powerful Alchemy.name: Powerful Alchemy
Powerful Alchemy.description: Alchemical items you create on the fly are particularly potent. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create an infused alchemical item that allows a saving throw, you can change its DC to your class DC.

Powerful Fist.name: 强力拳 Powerful Fist
Powerful Fist.description: 你知晓如何让双拳成为致命的武器。你的拳头伤害骰增加到1d6，而非1d4。因为很难用拳头打出致命的力道，大多数人用非致命无武装攻击进行致命攻击时会承受-2环境减值。但你在用拳头或其它任何无武装攻击进行致命攻击时，不会承受这个减值。

Precise Strike.name: 精确打击 Precise Strike
Precise Strike.description:
你用敏锐的洞察力发动攻击。当你持有派头，并以带有灵巧或娴熟特性的近战武器，或带有灵巧或娴熟特性的无武装攻击发动打击时，你造成2点额外精准伤害。若该打击是终结动作的一部分，则你造成2d6点额外精准伤害。

随着你的浪客等级提升，精确打击的额外伤害也会逐步增加。分别在5、9、13、17级时增加打击的额外伤害数值，以及终结技的额外伤害骰。

Precision.name: 精准 Precision
Precision.description:
训练让你可以攻击目标的薄弱部位。你每轮第一次命中你的猎杀目标时，还会造成1d8点额外精准伤害。（精准伤害会增加你原本造成的伤害，使用相同的伤害类型，但是对没有致命器官或者薄弱点的目标无效）。

在11级时，这一额外伤害提升到2d8点精准伤害，19级时，这一额外伤害提升到3d8点精准伤害。

Primal Hierophant.name: 原能导师 Primal Hierophant
Primal Hierophant.description: 你掌握了原能魔法中最为强大的力量，并且施展出完全不可思议的法术。你获得一个10环法术位，可以使用原能施法能力在此法术位中准备一个法术。对于那些让你能不消耗法术位施法或能让你换取更多法术位的能力来说，你无法使用该法术位。与其他法术位不同，你不会随着等级提升获得更多10环级法术，但你可以通过@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Chu6s3xVnpOB64GH]{导师之力 Hierophant's Power}专长获得第二个法术位。

Primal Spellcasting.name: 原能施法 Primal Spellcasting
Primal Spellcasting.description:
自然之力流淌过你的身体。你可以通过施放法术行动施放原能法术，并且你能够在施法时提供材料、姿势以及语言成分。由于你是一个德鲁伊，通常而言，你可以持有一个原能器材（例如冬青和榭寄生）来满足法术的材料成分来代替使用法术材料包。

在1级时，在每个早晨，你可以从原能列表的常见法术中，或者从其他你获得并通过学习法术学习到的原能法术中准备2个1环级法术和5个戏法。准备的法术会一直保留，直到你施放它们或者直到你再次准备你的法术。每日你可以准备的法术数量成为你的法术位。

随着你的德鲁伊等级提升，每天你可以准备的法术数量也会增加，你可以释放的法术的最高环级也会增加。

你的部分法术需要进行一次法术攻击骰来决定他们如何生效，也有的法术会令你的敌人掷骰来对抗你的法术DC（通常是一次豁免骰）。你的关键属性是感知，你的法术攻击骰以及法术DC也是用你的感知调整值。

Quick Alchemy.name: Quick Alchemy
Quick Alchemy.description: If you need a specific alchemical item on the fly, you can use your infused reagents to quickly create it with the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yzNJgwzV9XqEhKc6]{Quick Alchemy} action.

Quick Rage.name: Quick Rage
Quick Rage.description: You recover from your Rage quickly, and are soon ready to begin anew. After you spend a full turn without raging, you can Rage again without needing to wait 1 minute.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description:
Requirements You aren't fatigued or raging.

Grants @Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall unconscious, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage on melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can Seek while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Raging Resistance.name: Raging Resistance
Raging Resistance.description:
Repeated exposure and toughened skin allow you to fend off harm. While raging, you gain resistance equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier to damage types based on your instinct.

See specific instincts for more information.

Ranger Expertise.name: Ranger Expertise
Ranger Expertise.description: You've practiced your techniques to make them harder to resist. Your proficiency rank for your ranger class DC increases to expert.

Ranger Weapon Expertise.name: Ranger Weapon Expertise
Ranger Weapon Expertise.description:
You've dedicated yourself to learning the intricacies of your weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple and martial weapons and unarmed attacks increases to expert.

You gain access to the critical specialization effects of all simple and martial weapons and unarmed attacks when attacking your hunted prey.

Reconfigure.name: 再配置 Reconfigure
Reconfigure.description:
你是所有手艺领域的专家，而且总是在调整你的大发明。你可以花费1天休整期进行修补，以改变大发明的一项改修。你尝试一次手艺检定，使用符合你等级的高DC。成功时，你选择一个大发明上的改修，将其改为相同类别（初始，突破，革命）不同改修。

如果你有任何改修专长，在成功的检定后你可以改为将改修专长重训成其他的改修专长。新专长必须满足重训的标准限制。

Red Dragon Instinct.name: Red Dragon Instinct
Red Dragon Instinct.description:
You summon the fury of a mighty dragon and manifest incredible abilities. Perhaps your culture reveres draconic majesty, or you gained your connection by drinking or bathing in dragon's blood or after watching a marauding wyrm burn your village.

  • Red Dragon
    • Type Chromatic
    • Breath Weapon Cone of Fire

Anathema

Letting a personal insult against you slide is anathema to your instinct. Choose whether your character respects or abhors your dragon type. If you respect it, defying such a dragon is anathema, and if you abhor it, failing to defeat such a dragon you come across is anathema.

Draconic Rage (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 4 and change its damage type to match that of your dragon's breath weapon instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack. If you do this, your Rage action gains the arcane and evocation traits, as well as the trait matching the damage type.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

When you use draconic rage, you increase the additional damage from Rage from 4 to 8. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage when using draconic rage from 8 to 16.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing damage and the damage type of your dragon's breath weapon.

Redeemer.name: 救赎者 Redeemer
Redeemer.description:
你满怀仁慈与宽恕。你获得救赎瞥视（Glimpse of Redemption）神卫反应以及 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 虔诚法术。在善良信条之后，添加如下信条：

  • 对于犯下罪行的人，你必须首先尝试给予其赎罪的机会，而不是将其杀死或给予惩戒。如果他们不知悔改依旧作恶，你也许需要采取更为极端的手段。
  • 无论他人身份地位为何，你都必须对其报以同情和怜悯。

神卫反应 Champion's Reaction

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{救赎瞥视 Glimpse of Redemption} R

触发 一名敌人伤害了你的盟友，并且他们都在你周围15尺的范围内。

赎罪的幻景在敌人的脑海中闪现，罪恶的重负让他变得犹豫不决。这名敌人必须从下列选项中选择一个：

  • 这名盟友免受触发这次救赎瞥视的伤害。
  • 这名盟友在对抗触发这次救赎瞥视的伤害时获得针对所有伤害的抗力，数值等同于2+你的等级。在这次伤害效果结算完毕之后，这名敌人直到它下一回合结束为止获得力竭（Enfeebled）2。

神圣制裁 Divine Smite9级

拷问良心的内疚感袭向敢于蔑视救赎瞥视的敌人。因为造成伤害而触发了你救赎瞥视的敌人会承受等同于你魅力调整值的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续善良伤害} 。

升格 Exalt11级

你能保护多位盟友。你能够将来自救赎瞥视的抗力授予你自己以及你周围15尺内的所有盟友，包括触发反应动作的那位盟友，不过每个人获得的这个抗力都会减少2。

Research Field.name: Research Field
Research Field.description:
Your inquiries into the alchemical nature of the universe have led you to focus on a particular field of research. You might have a degree from a scientific institute, correspond with other researchers in your field, or work as a genius loner. Choose a field of research.

Your research field adds a number of formulas to your formula book; these are your signature items. When using a batch of infused reagents to create your signature items using advanced alchemy, you create three items instead of two. Each time you gain a level, you can swap one of your signature items with another formula in your formula book. This new signature item must be on your research field's list of possible signature items.

Resolve.name: 决意 Resolve
Resolve.description: 你的决意使你的意志如钢铁般坚毅。你在意志豁免上的熟练度提升至大师。当你在意志豁免中骰出了成功，你改为获得大成功。

Revelation Spells.name: Revelation Spells
Revelation Spells.description:
The powers of your mystery manifest in the form of revelation spells, which are a type of focus spell. Casting a revelation spell costs 1 Focus Point and increases the effects of your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. You start with a focus pool of 2 Focus Points. You refill your focus pool during your daily preparations, and you can regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to reconcile the conflicting or unconventional nature of your divine mystery.

Focus spells are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up. Focus spells don't require spell slots, and you can't cast them using spell slots (see @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.7AVspOB6ITNzGFZi]{Divine Spellcasting (Oracle)}). Taking feats can give you more focus spells and increase the size of your focus pool, though your focus pool can never hold more than 3 Focus Points.

Revelation spells have the cursebound trait, unlike other focus spells. This trait means they increase the severity of your oracular curse (see below) when cast. You can't cast a cursebound spell if you don't have an oracular curse.You learn two revelation spells at 1st level. The first is an initial revelation spell determined by your mystery. The second is an initial domain spell you select from one of the domains associated with your mystery, which you cast as a revelation spell, causing it to gain the cursebound trait.

Revolutionary Innovation.name: 革命性大发明 Revolutionary Innovation
Revolutionary Innovation.description:
你是空前绝后的天才，发明了一种能彻底颠复学术领域的技术——至少暂时颠复了你的大发明！为你的大发明选择一种革命性改修。如果愿意，你也可以选择一种同类的初始或突破性改修。

革命性护甲改修 Revolutionary Armor Modifications

  • 自动妨碍系统 Automated Impediments 你的护甲使用了一种电磁场，分谐波失真器，或其他技术让接近你的人难以移动，除非得到你的允许。当穿戴你的护甲时，对你的敌人来说，邻接你的所有空间都变成困难地形。
  • 能量屏障 Energy Barrier 你护甲的防御能消融任何种类的朝你袭来的能量。当穿戴你的护甲时，你获得所有能量伤害的抗力（酸液，寒冷，电击，火焰，力场，负能量，正能量，和音波），数值等于2+你等级的一半。你必须有谐波振荡器，金属电抗或燃素校准器改修才能选择该改修。
  • 极致抗力 Incredible Resistance 你改善了你的突破性改修所提供的抵抗伤害的能力。从你的大发明具有的下述突破性改修中选择一种：致密甲片，叠层网状织物，或张力吸收系统。将你从该改修中获得的抗力提升至你的等级而非你等级的一半。
  • 多重传感遮罩 Multisensory Mask (隐秘套装专用) 你在你的护甲上内建了一种多重传感遮罩，能从所有感官中扭曲你的轮廓，让你只留下朦胧的图像，沉闷的响声等等。当穿戴该护甲时，你对所有生物获得隐蔽，即使他们使用了非视觉的精确感官，例如蝙蝠的回声定位。和其他让你的位置保持明显的效果一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽躲藏Hide或潜行Sneak。如果你使用了敌意动作，隐蔽终止，直到你花费单动作重置了遮罩，这具有操作特征。
  • 完美堡垒 Perfect Fortification（力量套装专用） 你用如此重量级的防御系统全面强化了你的护甲，即使最致命的攻击也可能失去锋芒。每当你在穿戴这种护甲时承受重击，尝试一次 纯骰检定。成功时，重击变成普通命中。这不能与护命Fortification符文或其他通过纯骰检定抵消重击的效果叠加。另外，你获得2+你等级一半的精准伤害抗力。
  • 物理防御系统 Physical Protections 你的护甲有如此多的调整和预案，能够抵抗所有物理伤害。当穿戴你的护甲时，你获得全物理伤害（钝击，穿刺和挥砍伤害，也包括持续性流血伤害）的抗力，数值等于你等级的一半。你必须有致密甲片，叠层网状织物或张力吸收系统的突破性改修才能选择该改修。
  • 符文载体 Rune Capacity 你可能涉猎了一些山铜合金的研究，或发现了其他工程学解决方案，你按照某种方式建造了你的大发明，使其能够容纳一个额外的性能符文。你的大发明比普通的同类物品可以容纳1个额外的性能符文（最大可以用+3潜能护甲容纳4个性能符文）。

革命性构装体改修 Revolutionary Construct Modifications

  • 飞行底盘 Flight Chassis 你为构装体适配了一种飞行方式，例如添加了螺旋桨或用飞翼和轻质结构再造了构装体。你的大发明获得25尺飞行速度。
  • 奇迹器械 Miracle Gears 你完美配置了大发明的脑皮层，它变得更加智能。它的智力属性提升2，它从你知晓的语言中学会一种你所选的语言。你的构装体获得使用需要较高智力Intelligence才能使用的动作，例如胁迫Coerce和解译文书Decipher Writing。最后，你的构装体在两项你所选的基于智力或魅力的技能上获得传奇熟练度。你必须有惊奇器械改修才能选择该改修。
  • 抗性涂层 Resistant Coating 你的大发明难以被任何方式伤害。它获得5点全伤害抗力（除了精金）。
  • 符文基石 Runic Keystone 你在大发明中设计了一种类似符文石Runestone的装置，让它能够容纳一个性能符文，即使它不是武器或护甲。如果护甲性能符文能影响护甲的穿戴者，则能影响你的大发明自身。武器性能符文通常情况为武器提供的任何性能都应用在你的大发明的无武装攻击上，如常遵循所有需求（例如，斩首Vorpal符文只能应用在挥砍近战无武装攻击上）；如果符文只影响远程武器，除非大发明有内置的远程攻击（例如来自弹丸发射器初始改修的远程攻击），否则不会生效。如果符文通常影响武器的物理形态和外观，例如无相Glamered，该符文雕刻在你的构装体中时不会生效。
  • 防壁部署 Wall Configuration 你的大发明能够从可移动的构装体变成静止的战场碉堡。它可以花费2动作的行动展开，该行动具有操作特征，并从通常形态转变成又薄又直的金属墙，高10尺且长30尺。这堵墙必须穿过大发明的起始空间。当你的构装体是墙时，它不能进行任何动作，除了使用相同的行动变回来，它也不能轻易保护自己，陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及} 并在AC上承受额外的-2状态减值。墙会阻挡视线和效果线，除非你的大发明的HP降低至最大值的一半以下，此时墙上的洞能让生物看穿并利用掩蔽攻击，超小型生物也能直接穿过墙壁。

革命性武器改修 Revoluitionary Weapon Modifications

  • 攻击校准器 Attack Refiner 你的武器在每次失手后都会精确地重新校准，保证下一击的命中。你的大发明获得回摆和猛推特征。
  • 致命打击 Deadly Strike 通过精确计算，你找到了大发明的完美形状，得以在恰到好处的打击中造成极大的伤害。你的大发明获得致命d8特征。如果你的大发明已经致命，它的致命骰提升至d12而非获得致命d8。
  • 伤害强化 Enhanced Damage 你让你的大发明比同类武器更强。将大发明的武器伤害骰提升1级（d4到d6，d6到d8，d8到d10，d10到d12）。如常，你不能将你的骰子提升超过1级，因此这个改修不能和简易复杂化叠加。
  • 延展武器 Extended Weapon（近战专用） 你找到了一种建造武器的方法，让他能在平衡性不变的情况下延展出去。你的大发明获得长触及特征。如果该武器已经有长触及特征，将你的触及提升10尺，而非通常的5尺。
  • 梦幻合金 Impossible Alloy 其他发明家声称这在技术上绝不成立，但你成功创造了数种似乎。只有你能使用的金属合金。这些合金能够伤害对7种天金中任意一种易伤的对手。你的大发明被视为所有7种天金（渊铀Abysium，精金Adamantine，血汞Djezet，虚铅Inubrix，零晶Noqual，山铜Orichalcum，漠石Siccatite）。这意味着你能对多种生物造成更多的伤害，但你不会应用任何这些天金制成的武器所具有的特殊效果。
  • 动量维持器 Momentum Retainer（近战专用） 一种特殊的配重装置让你的武器在攻击时能维持更多的动量。你的武器获得叠劲和多用B特征。
  • 全距稳定系统 Omnirange Stabilizers（远程专用） 你调整了你的大发明，让它在任何射程上都十分危险和高效。如果你的大发明具有远射特征，则移除远射特征。否则，将大发明的射程增量提升50尺或武器的基本射程增量，选择更大的数值。
  • 符文载体 Rune Capacity 你可能涉猎了一些山铜合金的研究，或发现了其他工程学解决方案，你按照某种方式建造了你的大发明，使其能够容纳一个额外的性能符文。你的大发明比普通的同类物品可以容纳1个额外的性能符文（最大可以用+3潜能武器容纳4个性能符文）。

Rogue Expertise.name: 游荡者专家训练 Rogue Expertise
Rogue Expertise.description: 你的技术愈发难以抵抗。你在游荡者职业DC上的熟练等级提升至专家。

Rogue's Racket.name: 游荡者诡术 Rogue's Racket
Rogue's Racket.description: 为了继续那些非法行为，你走上游荡者之路后便开始发展自己的犯罪方式。你的诡术塑造了你作为游荡者的技巧，也决定了你如何拿下活计，同时在地下世界因某类活计积累名声。富有的客户甚至会为特定抢劫雇佣一整队游荡者好顾及方方面面，队内每位游荡者都专精于不同的诡术。选择一种游荡者诡术。

Ruffian.name: 无赖 Ruffian
Ruffian.description:
你偏向于用拳头或是威吓而非依靠技巧和花招。你可能是有组织的犯罪者，拦路强盗或是用家庭势力欺压他人的贵族。也许，你会为了私人安全琐事或是作为城市的守卫不断粗暴的使用技能。

你会利用任何手头上的工具来完成工作。除了偷袭职业能力列出的武器，你可以用任意简易武器造成偷袭伤害。当你在使用简易武器或是对拥有@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}状态（无法专注于防护自身）的敌人进行的攻击简单发生大成功时，你还可以应用你持用武器的重击专精效果。如果武器骰超过d8（在应用任何改变伤害骰的能力后），那么你就无法获得这一效果。

你在威吓与中甲上受训。你可以选择力量作为你的关键属性。当你获得轻甲专家时，你也会在中甲上获得专家熟练度，并且当你在获得轻甲大师时，你也会在中甲上获得大师熟练度。

Rune Patron.name: 符文庇护主 Rune Patron
Rune Patron.description:
你的庇护主司掌法印与符记、卷册与文书、字词与睿智。

法术表 奥术

庇护主技能 奥法

巫术戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.UmXhuKrYZR3W16mQ]{分辨秘密 Discern Secrets}

赠送法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{魔化武器 Magic Weapon}

Runelord Specialization.name: Runelord Specialization
Runelord Specialization.description:
You draw untold power from runes, sometimes called sin magic. You associate with one of the seven vices, also known as the seven rewards of rule: envy (abjuration), gluttony (necromancy), greed (transmutation), lust (enchantment), pride (illusion), sloth (conjuration), and wrath (evocation). Studying these techniques often tempts you with the associated sin. While leaning into it could corrupt you, it might make you more powerful. If you choose this class archetype, you must select @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{Runelord Dedication} as your 2nd-level class feat.

先决条件 You must be a wizard specializing in one of the seven schools other than divination.

Runelord Adjustments In addition to the normal school spell for your chosen school of magic, you learn the initial rune spell associated with your school, with its school adjusted to your chosen school of magic if it wasn't from that school already. Your pool of Focus Points increases to 2 Focus Points. At 8th level, you also learn the advanced rune spell associated with your school, also adjusting its school to match your chosen school of magic if it wasn't already, and your pool of Focus Points increases to 3 Focus Points.

You can Refocus by indulging in your school's sin in lieu of studying your spellbook. As you become more powerful, your indulgence grows. At 12th level, if you indulge in your sin to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus}, if you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1. At 18th level, if you indulge in your sin to Refocus, if you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

You are trained in martial polearms. At 11th level, if you gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.9XLUh9iMepZesdmc]{Weapon Expertise}, you become an expert in martial polearms.

Finally, you lose the ability to prepare or cast any spell from your school's prohibited schools. You remove all spells of those schools from your spell list, meaning you can't even activate scrolls or wands of such spells.

Additional Feats 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z0HX5L7bOOrKi0dD]{Tattoo Artist}

Scoundrel.name: 流氓 Scoundrel
Scoundrel.description:
你利用嘴炮，奉承和巧舌如簧来避免或逃脱棘手的危险情况。你也可以成为一个骗子或是欺诈师，带着一个新故事和计划。你的诡技也很适合有些声名卓著的职业，比方说律师，外交官和政治家。

当你成功@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}时，目标会直到下回合结束为止，对你的近战攻击陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} 。在大成功的场合，目标会直到你下回合结束为止，对任何近战攻击都陷入措手不及。

你在欺骗和交涉上受训。你可以把魅力作为你的关键属性。

Second Doctrine.name: 第二信条 Second Doctrine
Second Doctrine.description:
你从第二信条中获得增益:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sa7BWfnyCswAvBVa]{隐修牧师 Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.D34mPo29r1J3DPaX]{战斗祭司 Warpriest}

Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: 第二信条(隐修牧师) Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description: 你在强韧豁免上的熟练度提升到专家。

Second Doctrine (Warpriest).name: 第二信条(战争牧师) Second Doctrine (Warpriest)

Second Path to Perfection.name: 再入完美之道 Second Path to Perfection
Second Path to Perfection.description: 每次成功都让你更接近完美。选择完美之道中所选豁免外的另一种豁免。所选豁免的熟练等级提升为大师。若所选豁免骰为成功，则替换为大成功。

Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude).name: Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude)
Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude).description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success.

Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

Second Path to Perfection (Reflex).name: Second Path to Perfection (Reflex)
Second Path to Perfection (Reflex).description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success.

Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

Second Path to Perfection (Will).name: Second Path to Perfection (Will)
Second Path to Perfection (Will).description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success.

Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

Second Skin.name: Second Skin
Second Skin.description: Your armor has become akin to a second skin for you. Your proficiency ranks for light armor, medium armor, and unarmored defense increase to master. When wearing light or medium armor, you can rest normally, rather than receiving poor rest that leaves you fatigued.

Shared Reflexes.name: 共享反射 Shared Reflexes
Shared Reflexes.description: 你和你的幻灵增幅了彼此的反应能力，让你们都能够及时避开危险。你和你的幻灵在反射豁免上的熟练等级提升至专家。

Shared Resolve.name: 共享决意 Shared Resolve
Shared Resolve.description: 你和幻灵共同加固了你们的心智以对抗可能威胁到你们的效果。你和幻灵在意志豁免上的熟练等级提升至大师。当你在意志豁免上投了成功，将其替换为大成功。当你的幻灵在意志豁免上投了成功，将其替换为大成功。

Shared Vigilance.name: 共享警觉 Shared Vigilance
Shared Vigilance.description: 你和幻灵共同合作以保持对周围威胁的警惕，让你比你单独行动时能察觉地更多。你和你的幻灵在察觉上的熟练等级提升至专家。

Shark Animal Instinct.name: Shark Animal Instinct
Shark Animal Instinct.description:
The fury of a wild predator fills you when you Rage, granting you ferocious unarmed attacks. Cultures that revere vicious animals (such as apes or bears) give rise to barbarians with this instinct. You might also be at war with an uncontrollable, animalistic side of your personality, or you might be a descendant of a werewolf or another werecreature.

  • Shark Instinct
    • Jaws (Grapple, Unarmed) 1d10 Piercing

Anathema

Flagrantly disrespecting an animal of your chosen kind is anathema to your instinct, as is using weapons while raging.

Bestial Rage (Instinct Ability)

When you Rage, you gain your chosen animal's unarmed attack (or attacks). The specific attack gained, the damage it deals, and its traits are listed on Table 3-3: Animal Instincts. These attacks are in the brawling group. Your Rage action gains the morph, primal, and transmutation traits.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

Increase the damage die size for the unarmed attacks granted by your chosen animal by one step, and increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 5 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks. The frog's tongue attack and deer's antler attack gain reach 10 feet. If you have greater weapon specialization, increase the damage from Rage from 5 to 12 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing and slashing damage.

Shield Block.name: 盾牌格挡 Shield Block
Shield Block.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡} 通用专长，这是一个能让你利用盾牌降低受到伤害的反应。

Shootist's Edge.name: 射手锐眼 Shootist's Edge
Shootist's Edge.description: 你的射击令其他人无迹可寻。你的枪客职业DC熟练等级提升至大师。当使用一把你有大师或以上熟练程度的远程武器进行攻击时，你可以忽视第二和第三个射程增量带来的攻击减值。

Signature Spells.name: 标志性法术 Signature Spells
Signature Spells.description:
经验让你能更加灵活的施展某些法术。

每个你获得的法术级数上你都可以选择一个该等级的法术作为标志性法术。你不需要学习标志性法术的升阶版本；相反，你可以自由升阶这些法术。如果你学习了一个超过原本等级的标志性法术，你可以无需学习便施展这个法术的低级版本。如果你替换了标志性法术，你可以重新选择一个相同等级的新标志性法术。

你还可以通过重训在不替换法术的情况下改变标志性法术，这会花费和通常重训法术相同的时间。

Silver Dragon Instinct.name: Silver Dragon Instinct
Silver Dragon Instinct.description:
You summon the fury of a mighty dragon and manifest incredible abilities. Perhaps your culture reveres draconic majesty, or you gained your connection by drinking or bathing in dragon's blood or after watching a marauding wyrm burn your village.

  • Silver Dragon
    • Type Metallic
    • Breath Weapon Cone of Cold

Anathema

Letting a personal insult against you slide is anathema to your instinct. Choose whether your character respects or abhors your dragon type. If you respect it, defying such a dragon is anathema, and if you abhor it, failing to defeat such a dragon you come across is anathema.

Draconic Rage (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 4 and change its damage type to match that of your dragon's breath weapon instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack. If you do this, your Rage action gains the arcane and evocation traits, as well as the trait matching the damage type.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

When you use draconic rage, you increase the additional damage from Rage from 4 to 8. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage when using draconic rage from 8 to 16.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing damage and the damage type of your dragon's breath weapon.

Singular Expertise.name: 独到专家训练 Singular Expertise
Singular Expertise.description:
你在火器和弩类武器上拥有非同一般的武器训练使你在使用这些武器时造成更多的伤害。当你使用火器或弩类武器造成的伤害骰获得+1环境加值。

但这种对火器及弩类武器的专注也阻碍了你在使用其他武器时到达同样的熟练度。你的无武装攻击以及除火器和弩类武器外的其他武器熟练度不能高于受训，即使你获得了可以提高一种或数种武器熟练度至你最高武器熟练度的能力时（诸如许多族裔专长中的族裔武器专家等），如果你在枪客武器熟练度上获得了大师，这个限制提升到专家，如果你在枪客武器熟练度上获得了传奇，这个限制提升到大师。

Skillful Lessons.name: 学识技艺 Skillful Lessons
Skillful Lessons.description: 在3级和之后每个奇数级，你获得一个技能专长。这个专长必须是基于智力、感知或魅力的技能，或者是来自你的方法论。

Slippery Mind.name: 狡诈思维 Slippery Mind
Slippery Mind.description: 你玩弄心理游戏，运用认知技巧来摆脱影响心灵效果。你在意志豁免检定上的熟练度提升至大师。当你在豁免检定上成功时，你视为大成功。

Snake Animal Instinct.name: Snake Animal Instinct
Snake Animal Instinct.description:
The fury of a wild predator fills you when you Rage, granting you ferocious unarmed attacks. Cultures that revere vicious animals (such as apes or bears) give rise to barbarians with this instinct. You might also be at war with an uncontrollable, animalistic side of your personality, or you might be a descendant of a werewolf or another werecreature.

  • Snake Instinct
    • Fangs (Grapple, Unarmed) 1d10 Piercing

Anathema

Flagrantly disrespecting an animal of your chosen kind is anathema to your instinct, as is using weapons while raging.

Bestial Rage (Instinct Ability)

When you Rage, you gain your chosen animal's unarmed attack (or attacks). The specific attack gained, the damage it deals, and its traits are listed on Table 3-3: Animal Instincts. These attacks are in the brawling group. Your Rage action gains the morph, primal, and transmutation traits.

Specialization AbilityLevel 7

Increase the damage die size for the unarmed attacks granted by your chosen animal by one step, and increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 5 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks. The frog's tongue attack and deer's antler attack gain reach 10 feet. If you have greater weapon specialization, increase the damage from Rage from 5 to 12 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks.

Raging ResistanceLevel 9

You resist piercing and slashing damage.

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
当你敌人无法有效防御时，你就可以借此造成额外伤害。你可以对@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}的生物造成额外伤害。如果你用灵巧或娴熟近战武器，灵巧或娴熟的无武装攻击，远程武器攻击，或远程无武装攻击来对措手不及的生物进行打击，你可以造成1d6额外精准伤害。用投掷武器来远程攻击的场合，该武器必须为灵巧或娴熟。

当你游荡者等级提升时，偷袭骰的数目也会提升。在5级，11级，17级会成长一次。

Sorcerer Spellcasting.name: 术士施法 Sorcerer Spellcasting
Sorcerer Spellcasting.description:
术士施法

你的血统赋予了你不可思议的魔法力量。你可以通过施放法术动作施法，并且在施放法术时提供材料、姿势和语言成分。由于你是一名术士，通常来说你都可以使用姿势成分替代材料成分，因此你无需使用施法材料包。

你每日最多可以施放三个1环法术。在施放法术前你必须已知这些法术，并且你可以通过法术库职业能力来习得这些法术。你每日可以施放的法术数量被称为法术位。

随着你术士等级的提高，你每日的法术数量也会随之增加，你可施放的最高法术环级同样随之提升。

你的某些法术需要你尝试一次法术攻击骰来确认法术的起效程度，或是迫使你的敌人投骰来对抗法术DC（通常是尝试一次豁免骰）。由于你的关键属性是魅力，因此你的法术攻击骰和法术DC使用你的魅力调整值。

升阶法术

当你获得2环级以及更高环级的法术位时，你可以在这些法术位准备较低环级的法术的强化版本。这会增加这些法术的环级，升阶到对应的法术位。你必须在法术库中拥有对应环级的法术才能将法术升阶至这一环级。大部分法术会写明它们被升阶到特定环级时会有何提升。标志性法术职业能力可以让你免费升阶特定的法术。

戏法

戏法是一类特殊的不使用法术位的法术。你可以随意施放戏法，每日任意次数。戏法总是会自动升阶到你的等级的一半并向上取整，这通常等于你作为术士能施放的最高环级法术。例如，作为一个1级术士，你施放的戏法为1环；作为5级术士时，你的戏法是3环法术。
